52000003_QD__KATVAN_01__1-null-null.name: You think I'd let you take me in?

52000003_QD__KATVAN_01__2-null-null.name: I swear... I will come back and I will destroy you!

52000004_QD__MAIN__1-null-null.name: Grab the pizza to your right.

52000004_QD__MAIN__4-null-null.name: Thanks for bringing it all the way here.

52000004_QD__MASSEGE__0-null-null.name: Drop the pizza to use skills.

52000004_QD__MASSEGE__1-null-null.name: Destroy the wall, pick up the pizza, and move left.

52000004_QD__MASSEGE__2-null-null.name: Oh, dear...\nA filthy Giant Sewer Creep has appeared.

52000004_QD__MASSEGE__3-null-null.name: Take the elevator to get up to the 2nd floor.

52000004_QD__MASSEGE__4-null-null.name: Be careful! Stepping on the brick floor will destroy it.

52000004_QD__MASSEGE__5-null-null.name: Beware of the hungry piggies. Drop your pizza for a moment and deal with them.

52000005_QD__ACT01__0-null-null.name: Oh, you're here, too! It's good to see you again, haha!

52000005_QD__ACT01__1-null-null.name: Welcome. It's good to see you, too. Oh, look. The Empress is here, too!

52000005_QD__ACT01__2-null-null.name: I called everyone today because I have something that I must tell you.

52000005_QD__ACT01__3-null-null.name: A messenger from Layla, a former lumarigon elder, found me recently. They said that the descendant of life born in Drachenheim has disappeared...

52000006_QD__EXIT__0-null-null.name: Congratulations. You will receive the $npcName:11001478$ priestess's blessing as well as the prize.

52000006_QD__TUTORIAL_06_1__0-null-null.name: How far are you going to run?!

52000006_QD__TUTORIAL_06_1__1-null-null.name: Hmm?! That over there... that's definitely...

52000007_QD__EXIT__0-null-null.name: Congratulations. You will receive the $npcName:11001478$ priestess's blessing as well as the prize.

52000011_QD__MAIN__0-null-null.name: The Time Barrier...! It's shaking! We need to hurry!

52000011_QD__MAIN__1-null-null.name: We need to defeat all the monsters disrupting the law of time and stabilize the Time Barrier!

52000012_QD__MAIN__0-null-null.name: The ghosts are everywhere! Let's defeat them first!

52000012_QD__MAIN__1-null-null.name: S-save me... I'm scared... sniff sniff

52000014_QD__COLLAPSE_2000__0-null-null.name: The evil thoughts of $npcName:11001488$ are burning within. Be careful near the lava's hot air and crumbling terrain.

52000014_QD__COLLAPSE_2800__0-null-null.name: Hurry! This place is about to crumble as Balrog's will grows stronger.

52000014_QD__COLLAPSE_2900__0-null-null.name: Reach the Eternal Flame, deep within $npcName:11001488$'s evil thoughts!

52000014_QD__COLLAPSE_2900__1-null-null.name: You have entered $npcName:11001488$'s evil thoughts. Move along the road while Balrog is down.

52000014_QD__COLLAPSE_2900__2-null-null.name: Placing the flickering $npcName:11001488$ weapon in the Eternal Flame will melt the curse on the weapon.

52000014_QD__COLLAPSE_2900__3-null-null.name: You can't retrieve the weapon you placed in the fire, but you'll get a different powerful weapon, free of Balrog's curse. Remember to claim the weapon you've earned through much hardship.

52000015_QD__TUTORIAL03__0-null-null.name: Remember... Don't lower your guard, not for an instant!

52000015_QD__TUTORIAL03__1-null-null.name: Zurile, Dalt, Kirisika, Kahm... Will you really raise a blade against your own in defense of a murderer?

52000015_QD__TUTORIAL03__2-null-null.name: We stand with $npcName:11001231$! There's nothing else to be said.

52000015_QD__TUTORIAL03__3-null-null.name: You won't even try to justify your actions? After all we've been through... Cowards and traitors, the lot of you!

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__0-null-null.name: Well... Now I know what that sound was.  It was the entrance to the tomb collapsing.

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__1-null-null.name: We'll need to remove this debris so we can continue on.

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__4-null-null.name: Ngh... I think I tore my stitches...

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__5-null-null.name: Agh... Thanks. You got us out of a real pinch.

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__6-null-null.name: You're amazing. Guess I should've expected that from $npcName:11001281$'s disciple.

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__10-null-null.name: Ah, is that you, $npcName:11001281$...? I didn't find what I was looking for. There's nothing in this place besides the oldest writings of the Baaz.

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__11-null-null.name: You've got a lot of nerve desecrating this sacred place! The Baaz are turning in their graves.

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__12-null-null.name: Hmph. After all your talk about changing Terrun Calibre... I see now you're still stuck in the past.

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__14-null-null.name: Hear me, $npcName:11001281$. You'll never find what you're looking for working alongside the vermin of Terrun Calibre.

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__15-null-null.name: I've heard enough of your nonsense!

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__16-null-null.name: Hmm? Did you hear something...? Hey look, a switch!

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__17-null-null.name: $npcName:11001281$, are you okay? I see $npcName:11001231$ managed to escape.

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__18-null-null.name: I'm fine... It seems that $npcName:11001231$ is after the Wisdom of the Baaz.

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__19-null-null.name: The Wisdom of the Baaz...? You're telling me he's searching for something out of an old myth? There's no proof it even exists!

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__20-null-null.name: $npcName:11001230$, I must go to Victoria Island at once! There's someone I need to inform about what's transpired here.

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__21-null-null.name: All right. I'll head straight back to the fortress and put together a team to track down $npcName:11001231$. Ishura... Be careful out there.

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__22-null-null.name: $MyPCName$, return to the fortress with $npcName:11001230$ and join in the manhunt.

SoulBinder-null-null.name: The road shifts, but the destination remains the same. Absolute power will soon be mine!

52000019_QD__MAIN__0-null-null.name: Easy. You just have stick real close to me.

52000019_QD__MAIN__1-null-null.name: Hmm, let's see... if I do this... and that... right here...

52000019_QD__MAIN__2-null-null.name: Eek! These Wigglers are pretty upset!

52000019_QD__MAIN__5-null-null.name: Let's look in the second hole!

52000019_QD__MAIN__6-null-null.name: Hmm, let's see... if I do this... and that... right here...

52000019_QD__MAIN__7-null-null.name: Eek! The Wigglers are back again!

52000019_QD__MAIN__10-null-null.name: Shall we look in one last hole?

52000019_QD__MAIN__11-null-null.name: Let's be more careful this time! If I do this to this...

52000019_QD__MAIN__13-null-null.name: Hugh... I owe you guys big time! Good work!

52000020_QD__MAIN__1-null-null.name: You dare to interfere with our work? We will crush you!

52000020_QD__MAIN__2-null-null.name: Since you've already seen our faces... we can't let you go!

52000020_QD__MAIN__4-null-null.name: Not bad... but you won't be able to handle all of us!

52000020_QD__MAIN__5-null-null.name: So many people can't defeat a single person...?! Where did someone like that come from...?!

52000020_QD__MAIN_01__0-null-null.name: So you admit the information was bad?

52000020_QD__MAIN_01__2-null-null.name: This is all a big misunderstanding.

52000020_QD__MAIN_01__3-null-null.name: Enough excuses. For an intelligence broker, you're real dumb.

52000020_QD__MAIN_01__4-null-null.name: I think you need a lesson in respect. Guys!

52000020_QD__MAIN_01__8-null-null.name: And here I thought today was gonna be boring.

52000020_QD__MAIN_02__1-null-null.name: You caught me off guard last time...

52000020_QD__MAIN_02__2-null-null.name: But now you're going to pay!

52000021_QD__MAIN01__0-null-null.name: $npcName:11001264$ has used up all of her strength. Protect her! I'll stop Holstatt!

52000021_QD__MAIN01__1-null-null.name: Hurry, activate the protection rune beside $npcName:11001264$!

52000021_QD__MAIN01__2-null-null.name: No matter what happens, you must stay inside. Do not leave Eupheria's side. Do you hear me?

52000021_QD__MAIN01__5-null-null.name: No... the protection rune is growing weaker.

52000021_QD__MAIN01__6-null-null.name: Protect the rune stone! Don't let them touch it!

52000021_QD__MAIN01__7-null-null.name: Ugh... the runestone... If I deactivate the Protective Shield and harness its power...

52000022_QD__PATROL01__0-null-null.name: Hmm... So it was true that $npcName:11001231$ was here...

52000022_QD__PATROL01__2-null-null.name: $npcName:11001231$'s  runic energy still permeates every corner of the laboratory.

52000022_QD__PATROL01__3-null-null.name: What kind of experiments was he running?

52000022_QD__PATROL01__4-null-null.name: I don't know yet... but witnessing all this strangeness...

52000022_QD__PATROL01__8-null-null.name: No... I let my guard down...

52000022_QD__PATROL01__10-null-null.name: He was experimenting on these things...

52000023_QD__MAIN01__1-null-null.name: We can talk after we've dealt with the threat at hand.

52000023_QD__MAIN01__2-null-null.name: $MyPCName$, you've improved! Well, this is no time for reminiscing...

52000023_QD__MAIN01__3-null-null.name: It appears $npcName:11001231$ left a few clues about what he was searching for while he was hiding out here over the past few days.

52000023_QD__MAIN01__4-null-null.name: I don't know the specifics... But I know he's after a power greater than Wisdom of the Baaz.

52000023_QD__MAIN01__5-null-null.name: We need to figure out exactly what that power is before $npcName:11001231$ does. Hurry!

52000023_QD__MAIN01__7-null-null.name: Hmm... $npcName:11001231$... Is this what you've been chasing?

52000024_QD__MAIN__2-null-null.name: I-I found him! The others are staking out the entrance of his hideout.

52000024_QD__MAIN__3-null-null.name: Stay put and guard the entrance until I arrive!

52000025_QD__MAIN__2-null-null.name: Whew... They certainly didn't know when to quit!

52000025_QD__MAIN__3-null-null.name: Now, let's take care of our injured allies and recover what the pirates took from us!

52000025_QD__MAIN__5-null-null.name: Ah! $npcName:11001230$! Stop moving so much, you're making your wounds worse!

52000025_QD__MAIN__6-null-null.name: Hey, $npcName:11001281$. Considering everyone's conditions, it may be hard for us to move the books to Ellinia safely.

52000025_QD__MAIN__7-null-null.name: We might be able to... if the fairies of Ellinia help us...

52000025_QD__MAIN_ETC__2-null-null.name: Whew... They certainly didn't know when to quit!

52000025_QD__MAIN_ETC__5-null-null.name: Ah! $npcName:11001230$! Stop moving so much, you're making your wounds worse!

52000025_QD__MAIN_ETC__6-null-null.name: Hey, $npcName:11001281$. Considering everyone's conditions, it may be hard for us to move the books to Ellinia safely.

52000025_QD__MAIN_ETC__7-null-null.name: We might be able to... if the fairies of Ellinia help us...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__0-null-nu.name: Oh, it seems someone got here before us.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__1-null-nu.name: $MyPCName$, you're early. The others aren't here yet...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__2-null-nu.name: The empress kindly ordered them to gather... but I'm not sure it's possible for them to agree on anything unanimously.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__3-null-nu.name: Something big must have happened if we're all gathered here. What could it be?

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__4-null-nu.name: Sheesh, Rolling Thunder, keep it down. You don't have to shout to be heard here. Come on.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__6-null-nu.name: It's been chaos from the very start...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__7-null-nu.name: Sorry I'm late. I ran into a bit of trouble in the countryside...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__8-null-nu.name: Whew... so much work... they're always tugging us around, like we're dogs on a leash...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__9-null-nu.name: I know you're from the streets, but you should try to control what you say in a place like this.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__10-null-n.name: Hmm... that's enough, all of you. Looks like everyone's here...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__11-null-n.name: We've gathered today in the empress's name because there's a critical issue that needs all of your support.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__12-null-n.name: For the details... Ishura, why don't you brief everyone?

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__14-null-n.name: Will you help us stop Holstatt? It's not just the fate of the runeblades at stake, but the entire world.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__15-null-n.name: Hmm... So to summarize... You don't really have any idea how strong this so-called ultimate secret is nor what it actually does?

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__16-null-n.name: This is nonsense. Why would you draw us into this mess? Sort our your little family squabble within the Calibre!

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__17-null-n.name: I don't think I need to be here anymore. Good day.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__18-null-n.name: I understand the predicament, but to provide support in something so uncertain... I need to think about it. I'll be in touch.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__19-null-n.name: Well... everyone has their own agenda and way of thinking. We can't gain everyone's support immediately.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__20-null-n.name: But at least those who've remained will support us. Together, we'll find a way to persuade the rest.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__21-null-n.name: Hmm... I can't say I'm surprised by this turn of events, but... Well, what's in Empress's mind is also important... so...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__22-null-n.name: $MyPCName$, meet with the empress and ask for her insight.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_PRIEST__1-nul.name: Yeah. It must've been boring to wait all by yourself.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_PRIEST__3-nul.name: $MyPCName$, you're here too. Thanks to your help in Zeliska, we're able to have an event like this.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_PRIEST__13-nu.name: We've gathered today in the empress's name because there's a critical issue that needs all of your support.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_PRIEST__14-nu.name: For the details... Ishura, why don't you brief everyone?

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_PRIEST__16-nu.name: It's not just the fate of the runeblades at stake, but the entire world. Please help us.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_PRIEST__17-nu.name: Hmm... So to summarize... You don't really have any idea how strong this so-called ultimate secret is nor what it actually does?

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_PRIEST__18-nu.name: This is nonsense. Why would you draw us into this mess? Sort our your little family squabble within the Calibre!

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_PRIEST__19-nu.name: I don't think I need to be here anymore. Good day.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_PRIEST__20-nu.name: I understand the predicament, but to provide support in something so uncertain... I need to think about it. I'll be in touch.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_PRIEST__21-nu.name: Well... everyone has their own agenda and way of thinking. We can't gain everyone's support immediately.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_PRIEST__22-nu.name: But at least those who've remained will support us. Together, we'll find a way to persuade the rest.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_PRIEST__23-nu.name: Hmm... I can't say I'm surprised by this turn of events, but... Well, what's in Empress's mind is also important... so...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_PRIEST__24-nu.name: $MyPCName$, let's go to the palace. We should find what we can do and tackle that first.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__0-nul.name: Looks like there are people who are already here.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__2-nul.name: Oh, $MyPCName$! I'm so happy to see you again!

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__3-nul.name: The empress kindly ordered them to gather... but I'm not sure it's possible for them to agree on anything unanimously.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__4-nul.name: Something big must have happened if we're all gathered here. What could it be?

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__5-nul.name: Sheesh, Rolling Thunder, keep it down. You don't have to shout to be heard here. Come on.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__7-nul.name: It's been chaos from the very start...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__8-nul.name: Sorry I'm late. I ran into a bit of trouble in the countryside...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__9-nul.name: Ah, $MyPCName$! Ikas said there was a special guest, but I had no idea it was you.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__10-nu.name: Whew... so much work... they're always tugging us around, like we're dogs on a leash...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__11-nu.name: I know you're from the streets, but you should try to control what you say in a place like this.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__14-nu.name: For the details... Ishura, why don't you brief everyone?

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__16-nu.name: It's not just the fate of the runeblades at stake, but the entire world. Please help us.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__17-nu.name: Hmm... So to summarize... You don't really have any idea how strong this so-called ultimate secret is nor what it actually does?

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__18-nu.name: This is nonsense. Why would you draw us into this mess? Sort our your little family squabble within the Calibre!

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__19-nu.name: I don't think I need to be here anymore. Good day.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__20-nu.name: I understand the predicament, but to provide support in something so uncertain... I need to think about it. I'll be in touch.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__21-nu.name: $MyPCName$! I'll return to Henesys first.\nMeet you there!

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_THIEF__8-null.name: Sorry I'm late. I ran into a bit of trouble in the countryside...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_THIEF__9-null.name: Whew... so much work... they're always tugging us around, like we're dogs on a leash...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_THIEF__10-nul.name: $MyPCName$! When did you get here? Darn it, were you faster than me...?

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_THIEF__11-nul.name: I know you're from the streets, but you should try to control what you say in a place like this.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_THIEF__20-nul.name: I don't think I need to be here anymore. Good day.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__0-nul.name: Oh, it seems someone got here before us.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__2-nul.name: The empress kindly ordered them to gather... but I'm not sure it's possible for them to agree on anything unanimously.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__3-nul.name: Something big must have happened if we're all gathered here. What could it be?

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__7-nul.name: Sorry I'm late. I ran into a bit of trouble in the countryside...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__8-nul.name: Whew... so much work... they're always tugging us around, like we're dogs on a leash...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__18-nu.name: I understand the predicament, but to provide support in something so uncertain... I need to think about it. I'll be in touch.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__20-nu.name: But at least those who've remained will support us. Together, we'll find a way to persuade the rest.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__22-nu.name: $MyPCName$, meet with the empress and ask for her insight.

52000027_QD__MEETROOKIE01__0-null-null.name: If your body is slow, at least your senses should be sharp.

52000027_QD__MEETROOKIE01__5-null-null.name: Shh, light, silent footsteps. Look forward.

52000027_QD__MEETROOKIE01__7-null-null.name: They're standing on a device that opens the ground beneath them. If only we could get it to operate... We'd get rid of them so fast.

52000027_QD__MEETROOKIE01__8-null-null.name: Time to put your senses to the test.

52000027_QD__MEETROOKIE01__10-null-null.name: Well, for you it wasn't too bad, $MyPCName$.

52000027_QD__MEETROOKIE01__12-null-null.name: I'll take care of this guy, so take the golden safe to $npcName:11001822$.

52000027_QD__RANDOMLEVER02__0-null-null.name: As expected, your senses cannot be relied upon.

52000027_QD__RANDOMLEVER02__1-null-null.name: This is a waste of time.

52000028_QD__MAIN__1-null-null.name: $npcName:11000031$! Do you know where we might find the "Rune Pavilion" capable of absorbing the Baaz rune?

52000028_QD__MAIN__2-null-null.name: They say it's right under your nose...

52000028_QD__MAIN__3-null-null.name: The Rune Book seems to be pointing toward the Godspring.

52000029_QD__MAIN__0-null-null.name: What? There's no one here? Did we go to the wrong place?

52000029_QD__MAIN__5-null-null.name: $npcName:11001231$... He's already absorbed the Baaz's rune and disappeared!

52000029_QD__MAIN__6-null-null.name: Jeeeez! If only you didn't scream, $npcName:11001264$... I could have blasted them with my cannon...

52000029_QD__MAIN__7-null-null.name: What? What are you going to do with that junk...?

52000029_QD__MAIN__9-null-null.name: $npcName:11001231$ is definitely after the Runicta. He's probably teleported to the Rune Temple. Perhaps there's still some latent power in these runes...

52000029_QD__MAIN__10-null-null.name: $npcName:11001230$! Can you harness the power of these runestones to open the path?

52000029_QD__MAIN__11-null-null.name: Hm, sounds doable. Let's give it a shot!

52000030_QD__MAIN__0-null-null.name: Hurry! We have to stop $npcName:11001231$ from claiming the Runicta!

52000030_QD__MAIN__2-null-null.name: All right, to the second floor!

52000030_QD__MAIN_A__0-null-null.name: What? Did Holstatt already awaken the titan?

52000030_QD__MAIN_B__0-null-null.name: $npcName:11001231$!! Did that good-for-nothing fool wake the titan?

52000030_QD__MAIN_B__1-null-null.name: Can't you see? There's no time to waste. We have to move!

52000030_QD__MAIN_H__1-null-null.name: Haha... this is getting interesting! All right, $MyPCName$! Let's show them the true strength of our cannons!

52000030_QD__MAIN_H__2-null-null.name: What? There's more? Muahaha... You guys are all dead!

52000030_QD__MAIN_K__1-null-null.name: We better take care of that rune titan first! Everyone, move!

52000030_QD__MAIN_K__3-null-null.name: All right everyone, to the second floor!

52000030_QD__MAIN_R__0-null-null.name: No! The rune titan has accepted $npc:11001231$ as the bearer of the Runicta!

52000030_QD__MAIN_R__1-null-null.name: We're running out of time! We have to move!

52000030_QD__MAIN_R__2-null-null.name: $MyPCName$! It's not the end yet! Don't let your guard down!

52000030_QD__MAIN_R__3-null-null.name: All right everyone, to the second floor!

52000030_QD__MAIN_T__1-null-null.name: We don't have time to be surprised! Everyone, move! Think about it later!!

52000030_QD__MAIN_T__2-null-null.name: There's still much to be done!

52000030_QD__MAIN_T__3-null-null.name: All right everyone, to the second floor!

52000030_QD__MAIN_W__0-null-null.name: $npc:11001231$ has the Runicta...!!\nWe have to hurry!

52000031_QD__MAIN__0-null-null.name: Careful everybody! Don't take these jerks lightly!

52000031_QD__MAIN__1-null-null.name: Don't underestimate our enemies! $MyPCName$! Don't let your guard down!

52000031_QD__MAIN__2-null-null.name: Ugh! How annoying…! $MyPCName$! Let's destroy them in one go!

52000031_QD__MAIN__3-null-null.name: Everyone, be careful! The titan is seething with rage!

52000031_QD__MAIN__4-null-null.name: $MyPCName$! Don't let your guard down! May you go with divine protection...!

52000031_QD__MAIN__5-null-null.name: It's narrow here! Gather the enemies into one spot. The bowmen will support you from the back!

52000031_QD__MAIN__6-null-null.name: Haha, look, $MyPCName$! All those guests have lined up for a taste of our cannons!

52000031_QD__MAIN__7-null-null.name: What's going on...?! Like a bunch of back alley delinquents... Noisy, noisy... ugh!

52000031_QD__MAIN__8-null-null.name: Hm... There's no time to waste! Let's finish it in one go!

52000031_QD__MAIN__9-null-null.name: Sigh... $npcName:11001231$, that fool... We've almost caught up—

52000031_QD__MAIN__10-null-null.name: Wait! From now on, we need to be more careful! Focus!

52000031_QD__MAIN__11-null-null.name: $npcName:11001231$ is near! Hurry, we must avenge our master!

52000032_QD__MAIN__0-null-null.name: I will not allow you to escape!

52000032_QD__MAIN__1-null-null.name: Hmph. Do you really think yourselves my equals?

52000032_QD__MAIN__3-null-null.name: Everyone, focus!! The titan is moving!

52000032_QD__MAIN__5-null-null.name: Everyone, focus!! The titan is moving!

52000032_QD__MAIN__7-null-null.name: Be careful!! The titan is attacking!

52000032_QD__MAIN__11-null-null.name: The rune titan is moving...! Everyone, watch out!

52000032_QD__MAIN__13-null-null.name: Ahhh...! Be careful!! The rune titan is attacking!

52000032_QD__MAIN__15-null-null.name: Get a hold of yourself!! One hit from the titan could kill you!

52000032_QD__MAIN__17-null-null.name: Everyone, stay focused! If you don't want to die...!

52000032_QD__MAIN__19-null-null.name: Everyone, listen up! Deal with the titan first!

52000032_QD__MAIN__21-null-null.name: Sob... Sob... Because of me, $npcName:11001281$ is....

52000032_QD__MAIN__22-null-null.name: We don't have the time for this. There's still hope. We have to move straight to the Forest of Life!

52000032_QD__MAIN__23-null-null.name: O-Okay... The runestone's still got some juice... Enough to teleport to the $map:02000179$ right now!

52000033_QD__AUDIENCEWITHEREB_01__1-null.name: You've exceeded my every expectation. I look forward to seeing what you accomplish next.

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__0-null-null.name: Hey, $npcName:11001678$! Do you know anything about $npc:11000492$, the writer?

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__1-null-null.name: Boss told me to monitor him, but I need to know who it is to keep an eye on him!

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__2-null-null.name: Hey, idiot! $npcName:11000492$ is the one we tried to convince to let us pocket the goods that were supposed to be used for the announcement.

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__3-null-null.name: He's supposed to be full of integrity and upstanding and all. Might be hard to persuade him.

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__4-null-null.name: You don't even know what's going on in the organization. Are you just going around pretending to know what you're doing?

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__5-null-null.name: $npcName:11001678$! Amazing. Even you know what's going on. You've matured!

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__6-null-null.name: So where do I have to go to meet $npcName:11000492$? Do you have that info, too?

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__7-null-null.name: Oh, you. How much longer do I have to look after you? Good thing you've got such a great big brother.

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__8-null-null.name: I know it's your first time in Tria, but you've got to learn how to look after yourself.

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__9-null-null.name: So, you have no idea, right?

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__10-null-null.name: It's fine. Just keep eating that cone ice cream and stay put! Quietly!

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__11-null-null.name: Ah...! Are you making fun of my name?

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__12-null-null.name: You want to get beat up?

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__13-null-null.name: Must be nice to work with such great men, huh? Hehe...

52000037_QD__LOOKINTO_STRIKER_01__1-null.name: Are you curious as to how we got here?

52000037_QD__LOOKINTO_STRIKER_01__2-null.name: I heard that $npcName:11000492$ ran this way.

52000037_QD__LOOKINTO_STRIKER_01__4-null.name: Darn! $npcName:11001678$, who was that just now? That was fast!

52000037_QD__LOOKINTO_STRIKER_01__5-null.name: How should I know? By the way, something seems reeeallyyy wrong...

52000037_QD__LOOKINTO_STRIKER_01__6-null.name: What are you doing? We have to go inside.

52000037_QD__LOOKINTO_STRIKER_01__8-null.name: Wh-What's that? B-Bravos! Is he dead? W-What do we do, now?

52000037_QD__LOOKINTO_STRIKER_01__9-null.name: What do you mean, "what do we do"? We have to get out of here first. We can't linger, or else the blame might land on us.

52000037_QD__LOOKINTO_STRIKER_01__10-nul.name: I knew something felt strange... Things are just getting worse and worse.

52000037_QD__LOOKINTO_STRIKER_01__11-nul.name: Hey, why are you picking that up?! Agh, pass it to someone suitable quickly, before there's a misunderstanding.

52000037_QD__LOOKINTO_STRIKER_01__13-nul.name: We'll report this to the boss... See you later.

52000038_QD__MAIN__0-null-null.name: Do I just follow this path?

52000038_QD__MAIN__9-null-null.name: I can't stand places like this...

52000038_QD__MAIN__10-null-null.name: Turn on the computer up there.

52000039_QD__MAIN__0-null-null.name: What are you doing? Hurry and get rid of them!!

52000039_QD__MAIN__1-null-null.name: All right, now let's look for $npcName:11001678$.

52000039_QD__MAIN__6-null-null.name: All right. Let's get going, then.

52000040_QD__MAIN__0-null-null.name: Project Mantra...? What's this? Refinement rate... Sample data...

52000040_QD__MAIN__1-null-null.name: How boring. It's supposedly a Humanoid Engineering Research Institute... Just some lab records.

52000040_QD__MAIN__2-null-null.name: Hm...? T-This is? Hey, $npcName:11001682$! Look at this.

52000040_QD__MAIN__3-null-null.name: What? Did you find something useful?

52000040_QD__MAIN__4-null-null.name: It seems like a lab video recording... Look. The faces of those inside the test tube. They all look the same.

52000040_QD__MAIN__5-null-null.name: True. They do look pretty similar. Dolls? Robots? Are they humans? Perhaps twins?

52000040_QD__MAIN__6-null-null.name: 100 of them, though...? And calling them human doesn't seem very fitting, either...

52000040_QD__MAIN__8-null-null.name: Who are you? There wasn't anyone in here when I came... Who are you? Are you the manager of this... Huh?! You!

52000040_QD__MAIN__9-null-null.name: What is it, $npcName:11001678$? Do you know that person...? Y-Y-You! You look like the twins from the video!

52000040_QD__MAIN__10-null-null.name: $npcName:11001682$... that's the guy who fled from the cave with the toxic river.

52000040_QD__MAIN__11-null-null.name: I am a disciple of Guidance. I, too, have something I'm looking for. That's why I came here.

52000040_QD__MAIN__12-null-null.name: The incident at the poisonous cave has nothing to do with me. Please don't misunderstand.

52000040_QD__MAIN__13-null-null.name: Guidance? I've never heard of it. But that's fine. You said you were a clone, right? Does that mean you're one of them or what?

52000040_QD__MAIN__14-null-null.name: I can't answer that. Because... I don't know. The information I'm looking for is from a past I can't remember.

52000040_QD__MAIN__15-null-null.name: Then why are they making those clones or whatever?

52000040_QD__MAIN__16-null-null.name: Even though I'm a member of an end-of-the-road organization in the Underworld, I know that this situation is on a completely different plane than the Baba Powder incident!

52000040_QD__MAIN__17-null-null.name: How can I answer something to which I don't know the answer? I'm also in search of the answer.

52000040_QD__MAIN__19-null-null.name: I can tell you the few things I do know, though. I'm digging for information about BeyondLink to recover my lost memories.

52000040_QD__MAIN__20-null-null.name: I'm not sure if it's due to that, but they are after me and I am on the run.

52000040_QD__MAIN__21-null-null.name: BeyondLink is a bioengineering company based out of Taliskar, but that's just a front to cover for their true purpose.

52000040_QD__MAIN__22-null-null.name: I don't know what they're researching and developing, but it's been exposed that they are trying to use the slaves of the Land of Darkness.

52000040_QD__MAIN__23-null-null.name: Why is it so complicated? Phrase it so that I can understand!

52000040_QD__MAIN__24-null-null.name: As I mentioned before, I am on the run. I am being chased. I can't stay in this place for long.

52000040_QD__MAIN__25-null-null.name: If you're interested in my story, use the hub computer and view the information about codes zero, one, and two.

52000046_QD__10003042__2-null-null.name: Quiet down!\nAll your fussing's going to knock them out again.

52000046_QD__MAIN_01__0-null-null.name: To be honest, I didn't think you'd actually find me.

52000046_QD__MAIN_01__3-null-null.name: There's a reason no one has caught me yet.

52000074_QD__QUESTNPCSPAWN01__0-null-nul.name: Of course I hate $npcName:11003200$ for what he's done! But that doesn't mean we shouldn't at least talk to him.

52000074_QD__QUESTNPCSPAWN01__1-null-nul.name: In case you forgot, he murdered Winn Stilton. Your father! $npcName:11003200$ deserves nothing less!

Quest2017_2-null-null.name: Soon, I will take back the life you stole from me.

52010001_QD__MAIN__0-null-null.name: Who told you to take out the fire...

52010001_QD__MAIN__2-null-null.name: We have... the light... it shows which way he went...

52010001_QD__MAIN__3-null-null.name: Ooh... The glorious path of the Scion of Light...

52010003_QD__MAIN__0-null-null.name: Tada! I wasn't late, was I?

52010003_QD__MAIN__1-null-null.name: Who's that handsome guy standing outside? He's totally $npcName:11001298$'s type...

52010003_QD__MAIN__3-null-null.name: Hmm? Yes! I'm $npcName:11001288$. Who're you, lady?

52010003_QD__MAIN__4-null-null.name: Ah... I guess I look like an old woman to you...

52010003_QD__MAIN__5-null-null.name: Either way, I'm really glad to meet you and I'm relieved that you're safe. I'm $npcName:11001478$, the empress who protects Maple World.

52010003_QD__MAIN__6-null-null.name: Ah! The empress that's been looking for me...?

52010003_QD__MAIN__7-null-null.name: Ah! Sorry for being so casual before. Please forget that I ever talked like that.

52010003_QD__MAIN__8-null-null.name: But why were you looking for me?

52010003_QD__MAIN__9-null-null.name: $npcName:11001288$! Listen closely to what I'm about to tell you.

52010003_QD__MAIN__12-null-null.name: I'm going back. I'm going back to Drachenheim right this instant!

52010003_QD__MAIN__13-null-null.name: You all made it safely! Did you find the lumenstone?

52010003_QD__MAIN__15-null-null.name: She's weak, but now that the lumenstone has been found, she'll recover in time. Did you discover who moved the lumenstone to Lubelisk?

52010003_QD__MAIN__16-null-null.name: It was $npcName:11003053$... He was the one leading Kargon, the one who betrayed the lumarigons! He was trying to transform the lumenstone's light into darkness!

52010003_QD__MAIN__17-null-null.name: We weren't able to capture him. We almost had him... but he disappeared!

52010003_QD__MAIN__18-null-null.name: I'm sure he'll resurface sooner or later... Before he does, $npcName:11001288$ will have to recover her original form as a lumarigon, full of light.

52010004_QD__BATTLE01__0-null-null.name: I knew it. I was no match for Vasara Chen...

52010004_QD__BATTLE01__1-null-null.name: Hey, who're you? Another Blackstar goon?! I'm not really up for another fight...

52010004_QD__BATTLE01__2-null-null.name: But I've got to protect my friends!

52010005_QD__ACT02__0-null-null.name: You're here! I've been waiting for so long! Did you find the goods?

52010005_QD__ACT02__1-null-null.name: $npcName:11001258$ is waiting. Hurry and get them to her!

52010005_QD__ACT03__1-null-null.name: $npcName:11001288$... You must have felt your mom's presence...

52010005_QD__ACT03__2-null-null.name: I will collect my mother's memories no matter what!

52010005_QD__ACT03__3-null-null.name: I'll close this area off while you search for the memory fragments. The one who's read my memories may come looking.

52010006_QD__MAIN__0-null-null.name: Oof... Didn't quite stick that landing. Now where did—my necklace! That jerk stole my necklace!

52010006_QD__MAIN__1-null-null.name: That's enough out of you. You are of no use to me without the Lumenstone.

52010006_QD__MAIN__2-null-null.name: I've had enough of that nova's meddling in Master $npcName:11001813$'s affairs.

52010006_QD__MAIN__4-null-null.name: Street rats... I'll return you to the gutter, where you belong.

52010006_QD__MAIN__5-null-null.name: The plan should be underway by now. It was fun, but I don't have time to toy with you.

52010006_QD__MAIN__6-null-null.name: You should be grateful. I won't show you mercy if we meet again.

52010006_QD__MAIN__7-null-null.name: Big words coming from someone who's running away! At least $npcName:11001288$ is safe.

52010006_QD__MAIN__8-null-null.name: She's in shock. Let's get her to the shop so she can get some rest.

52010006_QD__MAIN__9-null-null.name: Sorry I doubted you before, $MyPCName$. You really pulled through for us. Thanks.

52010007_QD__MAIN__0-null-null.name: So... we've found the map but... it's ripped. What do we do?

52010007_QD__MAIN__1-null-null.name: This hero found the ripped pieces of the map. Let's see... how about we take a look and try to piece it together?

52010007_QD__MAIN__5-null-null.name: It's the Nazkar Main Hall! The entrance of the Lubelisk! Let's go! We have to find the lumenstone!

52010007_QD__MAIN__8-null-null.name: The moment the lumenstone leaves the Lubelisk, the Sanctum of Light will disappear into darkness once more.

52010007_QD__MAIN__9-null-null.name: Once you find the lumenstone, come to the Karkar Embassy. I'll be waiting with Mika.

52010008_QD__CATCHJAILBREAKER01__0-null-.name: Ha! Here you are! Did you really think you wouldn't get caught?

52010008_QD__CATCHJAILBREAKER01__1-null-.name: I told you, no one escapes Alikar... You think you're both so brave?

52010008_QD__CATCHJAILBREAKER01__2-null-.name: I'll drag you back to Alikar first, then we'll discuss your crimes!

52010009_QD__MAIN__0-null-null.name: That could have been dangerous. Thanks.

52010009_QD__MAIN__1-null-null.name: Whew... That scared the crap out of me.

52010009_QD__MAIN__2-null-null.name: Sheesh... That could have been bad.

52010013_QD__MAIN__1-null-null.name: $npcName:11001298$ has a keen eye when it comes to people.

52010013_QD__MAIN__3-null-null.name: Someone who's journeyed all the way from Victoria Island to find you.

52010013_QD__MAIN__4-null-null.name: $npcName:11001288$ has something to tell you, so I'm going to test them to see if they can be trusted.

52010013_QD__MAIN__5-null-null.name: Ah, I don't know! I don't know what you're talking about. I'm hungry. Let's eat and talk.

52010013_QD__MAIN__6-null-null.name: $npcName:11001288$... You... You just had a snack...

52010013_QD__MAIN__7-null-null.name: Yeah, a snack... I need a meal! I want to eat your omelet. Let's go!

52010013_QD__MAIN__8-null-null.name: Haaa... Maybe it's because you're a lumarigon... Your food cravings are...

52010013_QD__MAIN__9-null-null.name: Hey, you, friend! You should come to our restaurant, too. Let's talk more there.

52010014_QD__MAIN__1-null-null.name: Huh? It's that guy from before. Ah, whatever. I'm hungry.

52010017_QD__MAIN__0-null-null.name: What are you doing? Hurry on up here!

52010017_QD__MAIN__4-null-null.name: The last one is over there!

52010017_QD__MAIN__5-null-null.name: All the fragments of light have been found!

52010017_QD__MAIN__6-null-null.name: I can feel the power of light... I think I can open a path! Let's get back to the Sanctum of Light!

52010018_QD__MAIN__0-null-null.name: Empress! $npcName:11001288$ found them all. The sacred stones of lumarigon.

52010018_QD__MAIN__1-null-null.name: Thank you everyone. $npcName:11001288$... Do you feel something?

52010018_QD__MAIN_2__0-null-null.name: Everyone... thank you so much. Thank you for leading me here.

52010018_QD__MAIN_2__1-null-null.name: $npcName:11001288$... I hope that the dracheheim and lumarigon can find their places once again...

52010018_QD__MAIN_2__2-null-null.name: Yes... I'll be sure to return with a joyous smile. I have to go now...

52010020_QD__MAIN__0-null-null.name: Nom, nom, nom... Delicious. Better order another one once I finish this.

52010020_QD__MAIN__1-null-null.name: Exactly how many more dishes am I going to have to make...? And why are you the only guest?

52010020_QD__MAIN__2-null-null.name: I brought a flyer! If I bring 5 thousand mesos, I can eat as much as I want, right?

52010021_QD__MAIN__0-null-null.name: I brought a flyer! I can eat as many $npcName:11001292$ omelets as I want, right?

52010021_QD__MAIN__1-null-null.name: The restaurant lights stayed on throughout the night...

52010021_QD__MAIN__2-null-null.name: And everyone had a great time filling their bellies with delicious food.

52010023_QD__MAIN__0-null-null.name: I have to go this way, right?

61000001_ME_001__MASSIVE00__1-null-null.name: Trap Master is a game where you avoid the traps and try to survive until the end. Both the winner and loser will get prizes.

61000001_ME_001__MASSIVE00__2-null-null.name: Vanishing cubes! They appear to be drawing a shape. Move toward cubes that don't vanish and survive until the end!

61000001_ME_001__MASSIVE00__3-null-null.name: Let's start then! Are you ready?!

61000001_ME_001__MASSIVE00__4-null-null.name: The cubes are drawing a different shape and vanishing. Watch the ground!

61000001_ME_001__MASSIVE00__5-null-null.name: The cubes are drawing a different shape and vanishing. Watch the ground!

61000001_ME_001__MASSIVE00__6-null-null.name: The cubes are drawing a different shape and vanishing. Watch the ground!

61000001_ME_001__MASSIVE00__7-null-null.name: The final stage. Who will survive until the very end?

61000001_ME_001__MASSIVE00__8-null-null.name: Congratulations! You're the winner of Trap Master.

61000001_ME_001__MASSIVE00__9-null-null.name: Wow! Give a round of applause to our victorious winner!

61000001_ME_001__MASSIVE00__10-null-null.name: A special benefit for the winners! Empress  $npcName:11001478$'s blessing.

61000001_ME_001__MASSIVE00__12-null-null.name: An honorary bonus for the winners! Stand clear for thunderous wealth!

61000001_ME_001__MASSIVE00__13-null-null.name: A cheery bonus for the losers! Riches rolling in!

61000001_ME_001__MASSIVE00__14-null-null.name: Everyone has been eliminated. Please try this challenge again next time.

61000001_ME_001__WAIT__0-null-null.name: It will begin in just a moment. Please wait for others to join.

61000002_ME_002__MASSIVE01__1-null-null.name: Will you make it to the end? Win or lose, everyone gets a prize!

61000002_ME_002__MASSIVE01__2-null-null.name: The floor tiles will vanish one at a time. Don't fall!

61000002_ME_002__MASSIVE01__4-null-null.name: That was just a warm-up. The real game begins now!

61000002_ME_002__MASSIVE01__5-null-null.name: Wow, not bad! But it's not over yet!

61000002_ME_002__MASSIVE01__6-null-null.name: We've got some real survivors today. Who will make it to the end?

61000002_ME_002__MASSIVE01__7-null-null.name: Congratulations! You're the winner of Sole Survivor.

61000002_ME_002__MASSIVE01__8-null-null.name: Give a round of applause to our winner!

61000002_ME_002__MASSIVE01__9-null-null.name: For our survivor, we present the blessing of Empress $npcName:11001478$ herself.

61000002_ME_002__MASSIVE01__11-null-null.name: And an extra bonus for the winners!

61000002_ME_002__MASSIVE01__12-null-null.name: Here's a special gift for our losers. Enjoy!

61000002_ME_002__MASSIVE01__13-null-null.name: It looks like everyone's out. Better luck next time!

61000002_ME_002__WAIT__0-null-null.name: We're just about to begin. Please wait for more players.

61000003_ME_003__MAIN__0-null-null.name: Maple World's greatest MC welcomes you!

61000003_ME_003__MAIN__1-null-null.name: It's time for the Maple OX Quiz!

61000003_ME_003__MAIN__2-null-null.name: Read each statement carefully, then move to the O (true) or X (false) platform.

61000003_ME_003__MAIN__12-null-null.name: Wow, you're a quiz master! Congratulations on your win!

61000003_ME_003__MAIN__13-null-null.name: Too bad. Better luck next time!

61000003_ME_003__MAIN__15-null-null.name: Sit tight. We'll send you back to the real world!

61000003_ME_003__WAIT__0-null-null.name: The fun is about to begin!

61000004_ME__NOTICE__0-null-null.name: You made it to the end. Go through the portal and claim your reward.

61000004_ME__TRIGGER_01__0-null-null.name: Climb to the top of the tower before time runs out.

61000004_ME__WAIT__0-null-null.name: It will begin in just a moment. Please wait for others to join.

61000005_ME__MAINPROCESS__1-null-null.name: The game's going to start now!

61000005_ME__MAINPROCESS__2-null-null.name: You've reached the center of the cave.

61000005_ME__MAINPROCESS__3-null-null.name: If you step on the red platform, you'll go to the center of the cave!

61000005_ME__MAINPROCESS__4-null-null.name: If you survive until the end, I'll give you a prize!

61000005_ME__MAINPROCESS__6-null-null.name: While drawing a special shape, the floor will disappear. Try and survive!

61000005_ME__MAINPROCESS__7-null-null.name: This time, it's a different shape. Watch carefully!

61000005_ME__MAINPROCESS__8-null-null.name: This is the last shape. Focus, focus!

61000005_ME__MAINPROCESS__9-null-null.name: Winners! You sure are grand! As promised, the winners will receive a prize and $npc:11000441$'s blessing!

61000005_ME__MAINPROCESS__10-null-null.name: Those who were eliminated, don't be too hard on yourselves! Try again next time!

61000005_ME__MAINPROCESS__11-null-null.name: Oh my... Everyone's been eliminated! Try again next time!

61000005_ME__WAIT__0-null-null.name: Sit tight until your friends join! The game will begin soon!

61000006_ME__TRIGGER_03__0-null-null.name: Reach the goal before time runs out!

61000006_ME__WAIT__0-null-null.name: It will begin in just a moment. Please wait for others to join.

61000007_ME__MAINPROCESS_SPRINGBEACH__0-.name: Get ready. We're about to start!

61000007_ME__MAINPROCESS_SPRINGBEACH__1-.name: Let's get you to the playing field.

61000007_ME__MAINPROCESS_SPRINGBEACH__3-.name: At the start of each round, parts of the floor will shake.

61000007_ME__MAINPROCESS_SPRINGBEACH__4-.name: Find solid ground and survive to round 5 to win.

61000007_ME__MAINPROCESS_SPRINGBEACH__15.name: Congratulations! You're the winner of Spring Beach.

61000007_ME__MAINPROCESS_SPRINGBEACH__16.name: Give a round of applause for our winner!

61000007_ME__MAINPROCESS_SPRINGBEACH__19.name: And an extra bonus for the winners!

61000007_ME__MAINPROCESS_SPRINGBEACH__20.name: Here's a special gift for our losers. Enjoy!

61000007_ME__MAINPROCESS_SPRINGBEACH__21.name: Looks like everyone's out. That's too bad!

61000007_ME__MAINPROCESS_SPRINGBEACH__22.name: Now that the game is over, why don't you enjoy this lovely beach for a while?

61000007_ME__MAINPROCESS_SPRINGBEACH__23.name: In 2 minutes, we'll send you back to where you were before.

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__0-null-null.name: It's time to Dance! Dance! Stop!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__1-null-null.name: Dance to the beat and match the numbers on the floor!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__2-null-null.name: When you have enough dancers on your platform, no one else can join!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__3-null-null.name: Match the number of dancers to the number on your tile... or else!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__4-null-null.name: Are you ready for our first dance?

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__5-null-null.name: Nice moves you've got there! Time for dance break number two!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__6-null-null.name: You're not tired already, are you? Time for dance break number three!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__7-null-null.name: You're doing great. Time to let loose with another bonus dance!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__8-null-null.name: The last dance, already? Let's turn it up to 11!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__9-null-null.name: You guys sure know how to dance!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__10-null-nul.name: You can do better than that. Go again! It's dance time!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__11-null-nul.name: That's the spirit! You've got moves!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__12-null-nul.name: Follow the beat! Dance with all your heart! Again!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__14-null-nul.name: We're having way too much fun to stop now!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__16-null-nul.name: Ready for more? Dance, dance, dance!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__17-null-nul.name: Is it getting hot in here or what? Round 1 is gonna begin! You have 30 seconds!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__18-null-nul.name: Look at you shine! For round 2, you have 20 seconds!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__19-null-nul.name: That's the spirit. Round 3! You have 15 seconds!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__20-null-nul.name: Wow, you guys are amazing! Time for Round 4! You have 10 seconds!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__21-null-nul.name: Are we at the last round already? Round 5, go! You have 10 seconds!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__22-null-nul.name: Now for an extra special round. Go for numbers greater than 5!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__23-null-nul.name: Nab a red platform for better rewards. You have 15 seconds!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__24-null-nul.name: We're going all out in round 4! Go for numbers greater than 10!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__25-null-nul.name: Snag a red platform for an amazing bonus! You have 10 seconds!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__26-null-nul.name: Okay, big winners! Everyone who qualifies gets a bonus!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__27-null-nul.name: That wasn't too hard, was it? There's still another round!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__28-null-nul.name: What a shame. I hope you all come back to dance again!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__29-null-nul.name: Congratulations on winning, you dance maniac!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__30-null-nul.name: I can't wait to party with you again!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__31-null-nul.name: Time to dance back to where you came from!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__33-null-nul.name: You ready for your final dance? Time to pull out all the stops!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__34-null-nul.name: You guys sure know how to dance!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__35-null-nul.name: You can do better than that. Go again! It's dance time!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__36-null-nul.name: You guys sure know how to dance!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__37-null-nul.name: You can do better than that. Go again! It's dance time!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__38-null-nul.name: You guys sure know how to dance!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__39-null-nul.name: You can do better than that. Go again! It's dance time!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__40-null-nul.name: You guys sure know how to dance!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__41-null-nul.name: You can do better than that. Go again! It's dance time!

61000010_ME__BUFFSKILL__0-null-null.name: A flame has blossomed in the center of the arena.

61000010_ME__PVP__0-null-null.name: Are you ready for a free-for-all fight?

61000010_ME__PVP__1-null-null.name: You'll get 100 points for each KO and lose 50 points when you're knocked out.

61000010_ME__PVP__2-null-null.name: The higher your score, the greater your rewards!

61000010_ME__PVP__3-null-null.name: It's time to begin this bloody battle in the mine.

61000010_ME__PVP__5-null-null.name: Not enough participants to proceed. The match will end.

61000010_ME__WAIT__0-null-null.name: At least 5 participants must be gathered to proceed. Please stand by until more players join.

61000011_ME__ENTER__0-null-null.name: Face off against random opponents in the arena. Last hero standing wins!

61000011_ME__ENTER__1-null-null.name: Don't fall into the lava. It's hot!

61000011_ME__ENTER__2-null-null.name: A special perk for the winner: Empress $npcName:11001478$'s blessing!

61000011_ME__ENTER__3-null-null.name: A bonus for the winner! Here comes the onyx!

61000011_ME__ENTER__4-null-null.name: Here's a special gift for our losers. Enjoy!

61000011_ME__WAIT__0-null-null.name: At least 5 participants must be gathered to proceed. Please stand by until more players join.

63000006_CS__TUTORIAL01__0-null-null.name: Ah, you've regained consciousness. Can you walk on your own?

63000006_CS__TUTORIAL01__1-null-null.name: Hmm. Your magic feels unstable... Well, at least you can travel.

63000006_CS__TUTORIAL01__2-null-null.name: We must return to $map:63000012$. Do you remember the way?

63000006_CS__TUTORIAL01__3-null-null.name: We should hurry. Terrun Calibre hasn't issued a draft in our lifetime...

63000006_CS__TUTORIAL01__4-null-null.name: But the crisis at hand warrants it.

63000006_CS__TUTORIAL01__5-null-null.name: $npcName:11001230$ has temporarily taken on the role of Elder Blade.

63000006_CS__TUTORIAL01__6-null-null.name: Whatever happens next, you must be strong.

63000006_CS__TUTORIAL01__7-null-null.name: This bridge is old and rotted... I'll cross over first to make sure it's safe. You can follow as soon as I'm across.

63000006_CS__TUTORIAL01__9-null-null.name: You ought to be more careful. Are you all right?  See if you can find another way up.

63000006_CS__TUTORIAL01__10-null-null.name: Stop splashing around and get up here. I'm going on ahead.

63000006_CS__TUTORIAL01__11-null-null.name: You have your task and I have mine. I'll see you again soon.

63000015_CS__INTRO01__0-null-null.name: It takes a lot of guts to barge into Blackstar's stronghold alone. It seems you're as fearless as your namesake.

63000015_CS__INTRO01__1-null-null.name: My men say you're looking for some folks. I wonder if you've considered how your recklessness might affect these people?

63000015_CS__INTRO01__2-null-null.name: Hahaha... All right, let's have a chat, you and me.

63000015_CS__INTRO01__3-null-null.name: The truth is, I admire people like you who are so full of spirit... A $male:man,female:woman$ on a mission.

63000015_CS__INTRO01__4-null-null.name: Sadly, I can't just let you waltz out of here. Hmm... what to do?

63000015_CS__INTRO01__5-null-null.name: Boss, what are you waiting for?

63000015_CS__INTRO01__7-null-null.name: Say the word and I'll ice $male:him,female:her$!

63000015_CS__INTRO01__8-null-null.name: Idiots... Enough. You really think you're a match for our friend here? I'll be the judge of that.

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__0-null-null.name: So you're the Gray Wolf I've heard so much about. Quite a number you've done on our little hideout.

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__1-null-null.name: The Boss wants me to show you the way to $map:63000020$... I hear you'll be going up against the Champ.

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__2-null-null.name: This corridor will get us halfway there.

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__3-null-null.name: There's an elevator at the end that goes to an underground passage leading to the arena.

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__4-null-null.name: With all the hubbub, I expected you to be some kind of three-eyed monster.

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__5-null-null.name: You're not at all what I imagined. Well, follow me.

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__6-null-null.name: Did you really do all this?

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__9-null-null.name: But $map:63000020$'s champion is something else entirely...

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__11-null-null.name: I wonder if you could really beat him?

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__12-null-null.name: I'll see about getting you an escort through the underground passage. Just a moment.

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__13-null-null.name: It's me. I'm sending our friend down to you now. You are to escort them to the arena.

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__14-null-null.name: Your fight with the Champ will take place after today's tournament concludes.

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__15-null-null.name: Now, I'd best be off. I have important matters to attend to.

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__16-null-null.name: Here... Just in case things go badly in the ring. These herbs have healing properties.

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__17-null-null.name: Although, I'm not sure someone as strong as you will need them...

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__18-null-null.name: I look forward to seeing whether the rumors about you are true.

63000017_CS__CHAT01__0-null-null.name: The Gray Wolf is really here?

63000017_CS__CHAT01__1-null-null.name: Yeah, and $male:his,female:her$ skills are no joke!

63000017_CS__CHAT01__2-null-null.name: Hm... Still, there's no way $male:he,female:she$ takes down the Champ.

63000017_CS__CHAT01__3-null-null.name: I dunno man, this time, it could be really close...

63000017_CS__CHAT01__4-null-null.name: Hey, hey! If you're not going to buy anything, go chitchat somewhere else!

63000018_CS__CHAT01__0-null-null.name: I'll destroy you all with my nunchaku skills!

63000018_CS__CHAT01__1-null-null.name: Hehehe... You won't act so tough once you've had a taste of my cudgel!

63000018_CS__CHAT01__2-null-null.name: You think I'm afraid of that little stick? Hahaha!

63000018_CS__CHAT02__0-null-null.name: Do you think any of those guys have a shot at winning this?

63000018_CS__CHAT02__2-null-null.name: I heard the Champ is basically a monster.

63000018_CS__CHAT02__3-null-null.name: Hmph! I'll be the new Champ after today!

63000018_CS__CHAT03__0-null-null.name: Did you see the odds for today's match?

63000018_CS__CHAT03__1-null-null.name: I'm thinking of betting on myself and walking out of here a rich woman.

63000018_CS__CHAT03__2-null-null.name: Oh, quit it. He'll pulverize you.

63000018_CS__CHAT03__3-null-null.name: Tch. Maybe somebody'll be willing to take a dive.

63000019_CS__DRINKJUICE01__0-null-null.name: Well, shall we get on with the match then?

63000019_CS__DRINKJUICE01__2-null-null.name: Heheheh... It should be quite a show. All right, Gray Wolf. Let's see what you've got.

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__0-null-null.name: Ladies and gentlemen, we have a special treat for you tonight—a surprise battle for the $map:63000020$ championship!

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__1-null-null.name: The rules are simple! Contenders will battle through three rounds of qualifiers. The last one standing earns the right to take on the reigning champion!

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__2-null-null.name: Introducing our first fighter, the gigantic, roguish... Sylva!

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__3-null-null.name: And their challenger, Kerning City's lonely beast! Graaaaay Wolf!!

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__4-null-null.name: Amazing! Our next contender is one foul fowl who never quacks under pressure... the immortal $npc:29000101$!

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__5-null-null.name: And their challenger, Kerning City's lonely beast! Graaaaay Wolf!!

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__6-null-null.name: Unbelievable! It was over in a flash! But our next contestant's no pushover. Here to crush his foes with lightning-fast nunchaku, it's $npc:29000102$!

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__7-null-null.name: And their challenger, Kerning City's lonely beast! Graaaaay Wolf!!

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__8-null-null.name: Astounding! The ravenous Gray Wolf has torn through all $male:his,female:her$ foes in the blink of an eye! But that was only a warm-up, folks. It's time for the main event!

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__9-null-null.name: ....Huh? What's going on? My head feels all wobbly...

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__10-null-null.name: Am I imagining things? The dizziness seems to have passed.

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__11-null-null.name: Slavering for the $map:63000020$ champion's belt, a wild beast has emerged from the shadows! The vigilante who took on 100 Blackstar gangsters and sent them all to the emergency room...

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__12-null-null.name: Off to a riotous start in their $map:63000020$ debut, it's the hero of Woodward, the scourge of the streets, the one, the only, the Graaaaay Wooolf!

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__13-null-null.name: And here to defend his title tonight is a very familiar face. With an unassailable record of 47 wins, one tie and ZERO losses, it's the reigning champion of $map:63000020$!

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__14-null-null.name: Presenting the invulnerable Titanium Fist, the Reaper of the Ring, our undefeated hero. You know him, you love him, it's Vasara Chen!

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__15-null-null.name: Ladies and gents the battle of a lifetime is about to begin! ARE... YOU... READY?!

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__16-null-null.name: It's about time. Let's see if you're as tough as they say.

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__17-null-null.name: All right, Gray Wolf... Show me what you've got.

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__18-null-null.name: What happened to that determination I sensed in you? That fire...? What a disappointment...

63000021_CS__WAKUP01__0-null-null.name: When's this $male:guy,female:lady$ gonna wake up? I ain't got all day.

63000021_CS__WAKUP01__1-null-null.name: You blockhead. Can't you see $male:he's,female:she's$ awake?

63000021_CS__WAKUP01__2-null-null.name: What? Really? It's about time. Though I'm honestly surprised $male:he,female:she$ woke up at all.

63000021_CS__WAKUP01__4-null-null.name: Sorry, Miss. This meathead's a real talker.

63000021_CS__WAKUP01__5-null-null.name: What'd you say you scrawny little weirdo?

63000021_CS__WAKUP01__6-null-null.name: Shut yer yap and show some respect in front of the chairwoman.

63000021_CS__WAKUP01__10-null-null.name: $npcName:11003125$ you idiot, you're gonna get us in trouble.

63000021_CS__WAKUP01__11-null-null.name: Keep talking and I'll knock that tiny head off your body.

63000021_CS__WAKUP01__12-null-null.name: ...Sigh. The things I put up with.

63000021_CS__WAKUP01__13-null-null.name: How are you feeling, Gray Wolf? Do you know where you are?

63000021_CS__WAKUP01__14-null-null.name: <font color="#909090">(Crackle)</font> It's me. Yes, $male:he's,female:she's$ awake. <font color="#909090">(Crackle)</font> I was just about to send $male:him,female:her$ your way.

63000021_CS__WAKUP01__16-null-null.name: As expected, the boss has called you to the VIP showroom. It's best you hurry along.

63000022_CS__BUSINESS01__0-null-null.name: It seems you're finally back with us. Would you care for another drink?

63000022_CS__BUSINESS01__1-null-null.name: I was looking forward to a more violent brawl... But still, it's been a while since we've had such an entertaining fight.

63000022_CS__BUSINESS01__2-null-null.name: What's with the sour face? Are you angry that you lost to Vasara Chen? Don't be. He's simply out of your league.

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__0-null-null.name: —You got all that? We can't let the Gray Wolf out of our sights or the boss'll have our heads.

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__1-null-null.name: Who do you think you're lecturing? Any more of your arrogant whining and I'll knock you on your butt.

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__2-null-null.name: Are you kidding me? Your idiocy is the reason we keep getting called out. If you don't want to hear it, then get your act together.

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__3-null-null.name: And by the way, you wouldn't last three seconds in the ring with me. Boss paired us up so I could babysit you.

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__4-null-null.name: What'd you say you beardy little weirdo?!

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__6-null-null.name: You promised you wouldn't call me that!

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__7-null-null.name: Hey, you started it! And it's your name ain't it? I think I'll call you by your full name from now on!

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__8-null-null.name: HAHAHA! $npcName:11000708$! You look like a bear, but you've got a name like a snot-nosed little rich girl.

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__9-null-null.name: Grrr... At least I don't look like some ugly little creep!

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__10-null-null.name: You look like somebody who hangs out in an alley selling ladies' undergarments!

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__11-null-null.name: Oh yeah? You want a piece of me?!

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__12-null-null.name: Oh yeah? You want a piece of me?!

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__13-null-null.name: Of all the people to be paired with, I'm stuck with these children... At least I won't have to suffer alone, eh Gray Wolf?

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__14-null-null.name: Well, I'll leave these idiots to you.

02000177_BF__MAIN__0-null-null.name: Horus is attacking the townsfolk! Stop him from causing any more damage!

02000251_BF__TIMER__2-null-null.name: I, the greatest of the Four Kings, will destroy you!

02000295_BF__MAIN__0-null-null.name: We have to free the slaves from the arena!

02000295_BF__MAIN__3-null-null.name: We're all going to die here...

02000295_BF__MAIN__7-null-null.name: Save me save me save me!

02000295_BF__MAIN__14-null-null.name: You take care of the arena!

02000295_BF__MAIN__15-null-null.name: We'll take care of these deadbeats!

02000295_BF__MAIN__32-null-null.name: Everything here seems to be under control. Good work.

02000296_BF__MAIN__0-null-null.name: You've made it in one piece. There's someone up ahead.

02000296_BF__MAIN__3-null-null.name: Eve is at the top of the tower. I can sense her...

02000296_BF__MAIN__4-null-null.name: We'll take care of this level. You go get $npcName:11000523$!

02000296_BF__MAIN__7-null-null.name: Let's get this over with and catch up to $npcName:11001236$.

02000296_BF__MAIN__8-null-null.name: I have a bad feeling about this. Be careful.

02000318_BF__MOBSPAWN_01__0-null-null.name: Defeat the pirates in the Moonlight Fortress!

02000329_BF__01_MAIN__0-null-null.name: Uh oh... What should I do...?

02000329_BF__01_MAIN__2-null-null.name: All my chickens are gone! Help me!

02000329_BF__01_MAIN__3-null-null.name: I bet it was those mean monkeys!

02000335_BF__MAIN__1-null-null.name: The freight car has been taken! Let's move to the engine room!

02000345_BF__MAIN__0-null-null.name: You're late! Let's start the shoot.

02000345_BF__MAIN__1-null-null.name: You're late! Let's start the shoot.

02000345_BF__MAIN__2-null-null.name: Let's see, the scene we're about to shoot is...

02000345_BF__MAIN__3-null-null.name: Let's see, the scene we're about to shoot is...

02000345_BF__MAIN__11-null-null.name: Establishing shot, the Slime King arrives at the castle.

02000345_BF__MAIN__14-null-null.name: You've come to take my castle from me?

02000345_BF__MAIN__15-null-null.name: You've come to take my castle from me?

02000345_BF__MAIN__16-null-null.name: I'll make you regret stepping foot in my home!

02000345_BF__MAIN__17-null-null.name: I'll make you regret stepping foot in my home!

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__0-null-null.name: The quest cannot be completed because your inventory is full. You will be returned to the original map.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__1-null-null.name: The quest cannot be completed because your inventory is full. You will be returned to the original map.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__2-null-null.name: The quest cannot be completed because your inventory is full. You will be returned to the original map.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__3-null-null.name: Dark Sanctum: Black Moon Abyss Citadel

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__4-null-null.name: This is a shameful turn of events, $npcName:11001811$. For my colleague to fail both at Henesys and at Perion...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__5-null-null.name: And where were your Rooks when my soldiers were facing the Vayar?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__6-null-null.name: You were supposed to support us!

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__7-null-null.name: My liege, if you want him punished, then I will gladly—

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__8-null-null.name: You think you can pin your failures on me?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__9-null-null.name: I followed the $npcName:11001811$'s orders to the letter, you raggedy buffoon.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__10-null-nul.name: You, on the other hand, have failed twice now. You don't deserve your rank here.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__11-null-nul.name: You're digging your own grave, $npcName:11001815$. Shall I bury you in it?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__14-null-nul.name: Do you know why I have summoned you here?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__15-null-nul.name: If your incompetence continues, our plans in Ellinia are certain to fail.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__17-null-nul.name: While you fight amongst yourselves, our enemies move against us.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__18-null-nul.name: For such an entity to appear in Maple World... It was unexpected...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__19-null-nul.name: Who cares about $male:him,female:her$? I'm waaaay better than that stupid bug. I should've squished $male:him,female:her$ when I had the chance!

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__20-null-nul.name: Leave it to me. I'll wipe $MyPCName$ from the face of Maple World.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__23-null-nul.name: You've already had your fun in Kerning City. Now it's time to focus on greater things.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__24-null-nul.name: Good point. Kerning City was a ton of fun.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__25-null-nul.name: Just you wait. I'm gonna give you the best army! Better than any stinky old devil army. Something totally new!

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__26-null-nul.name: See to it that you do. But do it quietly. We cannot afford for the empress's pawns to learn our true plans.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__27-null-nul.name: Fine, fine. I'll be nice and quiet.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__28-null-nul.name: I somehow don't think that "nice and quiet" will be enough.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__29-null-nul.name: $npc:11001820$ has made herself into the empire's most wanted criminal. Even those idiots in the guard are bound to stumble upon her lair sooner or later.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__30-null-nul.name: You think I can't handle some dummy guards?!

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__31-null-nul.name: We need a distraction. Something to keep them busy.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__32-null-nul.name: And who's going to do that? Even with the $npcName:11001811$'s express summons, we're missing over half of the commanders.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__34-null-nul.name: Ah, the red cape. Are you certain you're up to the task?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__35-null-nul.name: I'm the most qualified person for this job.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__36-null-nul.name: The royal court and their allies still consider me family.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__37-null-nul.name: Their sentimentality will be their undoing.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__0-null-null.name: The quest cannot be completed because your inventory is full. You will be returned to the original map.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__2-null-null.name: Then again... You sure had a lot of time to prepare your 'magic'... Heh heh heh...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__3-null-null.name: ...Turka. How do you know what $npcName:11001811$ is preparing?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__4-null-null.name: I have eyes and ears everywhere...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__5-null-null.name: To think that only the Rooks see and hear all... Such arrogance...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__6-null-null.name: All right, then let me fill you in, you who have eyes and ears everywhere.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__7-null-null.name: I don't know how much you know about the magic that $npcName:11001811$ is preparing, but...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__8-null-null.name: Please blab about it everywhere. That way I have a reason to slice you with my sword.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__9-null-null.name: Hehehe... Are you telling me to watch my mouth?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__10-null-nul.name: If a mouth even exists inside those rags.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__11-null-nul.name: What an interesting threat... $npcName:11001815$... Did you know? I've heard a lot of interesting things...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__12-null-nul.name: Since the $npcName:11001811$ is not here, let me tell your seemingly carefree self a few things...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__13-null-nul.name: Thanks to $npcName:11000525$, the Tria royals and the guardian are all focused solely on her...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__14-null-nul.name: It's very good news for us...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__15-null-nul.name: You can't take the human bonds of family lightly... It is their greatest strength, and their greatest weakness...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__16-null-nul.name: $npc:11001815$, you became a commander for your family's sake, did you not?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__17-null-nul.name: Say another word, and I'll consider it just cause. So how about it? Care to continue?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__19-null-nul.name: Heh heh heh... Calm down... I just wanted to compliment $npcName:11000525$, that's all...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__21-null-nul.name: The Tria royals don't seem to want to give you up so easily... I wanted to ask you how you felt about that... Heh heh...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__22-null-nul.name: It was just a mission. I have no affection for the Red Capes.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__23-null-nul.name: Of course, you shouldn't... Especially if you want to be of use...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__24-null-nul.name: I've pledged my loyalty entirely to the $npcName:11001811$, $npcName:11001813$.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__25-null-nul.name: Take it easy, heh heh. I just thought it'd be fun to hear how you felt...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__26-null-nul.name: $npcName:11000525$, if you have nothing to say, get going. I'll report to $npcName:11001811$.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__28-null-nul.name: "A false peace created through the sacrifice of innocents..."

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__29-null-nul.name: Maple World has no future as long as its people believe this fabricated history. That is why I turned my back on everything and became the Red Cape.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__30-null-nul.name: But after everything that's happened... Can we be so sure that saving the world is truly the Black Mage's goal?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__31-null-nul.name: ...There's no turning back for me now.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__0-null-null.name: The quest cannot be completed because your inventory is full. You will be returned to the original map.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__1-null-null.name: Finally... The Innocent of Darkness is within reach.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__2-null-null.name: But too much of our plan was revealed in the process. And now, they're right on our heels. Worst of all, the Innocent of Darkness is beyond our grasp.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__3-null-null.name: Dark Lord, we had no other option. Sacrifices must be made to achieve our goals. We have dealt with such decisions in the past.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__4-null-null.name: But it was because of that choice that the world was able to welcome the existence of $npcName:11001811$, no? ...heh heh

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__5-null-null.name: Oooh? $npcName:11001813$, keep acting like that and you'll die.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__6-null-null.name: Just say the command and I'll...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__8-null-null.name: Their words are not completely wrong.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__9-null-null.name: If it weren't for that situation, I might still be blinded by false hope. The false hope that the light will rescue everyone...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__10-null-nul.name: A world intoxicated with light will cover up the ugliness of reality and make it beautiful... We are so very familiar with this.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__11-null-nul.name: Wait just a little longer, Win... I mean, Dark. Lord. $npcName:11001698$ will completely destroy that world of light!

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__12-null-nul.name: With $npcName:11000525$ engaging their full attention,my army has been able to prepare without any obstacles!

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__14-null-nul.name: Argh! I didn't let my guard down! $npcName:11001698$ just...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__15-null-nul.name: $npcName:11001698$, I gave you the most important mission, didn't I?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__16-null-nul.name: I will need you when the time is most critical. Until then, don't make any mistakes.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__17-null-nul.name: Sorry to ask... Heh heh... But was $npcName:11001698$'s mission really that important...?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__18-null-nul.name: The four Commanders who aren't here are all out on missions, but it seems as though $npc:11001698$'s is the only mission the $npcName:11001811$ considers important.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__19-null-nul.name: Conspiracy theorist $npcName:11001813$. That should be your new title.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__20-null-nul.name: I gave you the job of spreading disbelief, jealousy, and envy throughout Maple World. And you've been doing a fantastic job of it.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__21-null-nul.name: That's the reason you're the owner of Conspiracy within the 7 Commanders.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__24-null-nul.name: The first step to shed the world of light... is to expose the rage of darkness to the source of light.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__25-null-nul.name: It'd be good for the one who deals the blow to be someone that "died" because of the light.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__26-null-nul.name: With the its name and its mission... Doesn't $npcName:11001698$ seem perfectly suited for the role?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__28-null-nul.name: $npc:11001698$'s army needs more time to complete their preparations. But with most of the commanders busy attending to other assignments, we're short on manpower.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__29-null-nul.name: I think it's still too soon...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__31-null-nul.name: $npc:11000525$ has been moving a lot lately. There's a risk of her being tracked while trying to divert attention.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__32-null-nul.name: The board is set. The time has come to choose your knight.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__33-null-nul.name: I think it's time we find some new bait... Some extremely fresh new bait...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__34-null-nul.name: I have an excellent plan, $npcName:11001811$... Trust this task to I, Conspirator $npcName:11001813$, heh heh.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__35-null-nul.name: $npcName:11001815$ and the Rooks are unable to take action due to the Black Moon, not to mention the Blood Red Lion in Elnas Fortress...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__37-null-nul.name: $npcName:11001811$! $npcName:11001813$ cannot be trusted. Why not select Gray Leopard instead? Although he was only just appointed a commander, his loyalty is...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__38-null-nul.name: $npcName:11001813$ will try to justify his name within the 7 Commanders, $npcName:11001815$. Just focus on your mission.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__40-null-nul.name: So, $npc:11001813$... How exactly will you draw their attention?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__41-null-nul.name: I'm not going to spoil it before the fun has even begun, but I've got my eyes on a few... pawns. Oh yes, one this is certain: $npcName:11001815$ will really enjoy this... heh heh...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__42-null-nul.name: It's time to start using them...

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__0-null-null.name: The quest cannot be completed because your inventory is full. You will be returned to the original map.

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__3-null-null.name: $npcName:11000044$, I'm hurt. Weren't you to contact me, first?

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__4-null-null.name: $npcName:11001813$! I never should have trusted you, you raggedy windbag!

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__5-null-null.name: If the $npcName:11001815$ were here... he'd put you in your place...

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__6-null-null.name: $npcName:11001815$, $npcName:11001815$, $npcName:11001815$. Do I hear an echo in here?

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__7-null-null.name: Where is your $npcName:11001815$ now, hm? Where was he when the empire's hounds started closing in on you?
