52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__8-null-null.name: Silence, fool! He and the Rooks have a greater purpose... The Black Moon...

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__9-null-null.name: And this so-called "Black Moon" is more important than your life, is it? How cruel.

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__10-null-null.name: Don't mock them simply because you have no sense of duty...

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__11-null-null.name: Perhaps not. But what of your duty, $npcName:11003200$?

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__13-null-null.name: You swore to protect $npcName:11000523$, did you not? Sold your soul to carry out this duty of love. To guard her...

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__15-null-null.name: You lie before me, broken. How will you protect your precious $npcName:11000069$ like this? How will you save her world?

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__16-null-null.name: You placed your trust in the $npcName:11001815$, but he never cared about your "duty."

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__18-null-null.name: He put you at the head of Dark Wind and turned you into his puppet.

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__19-null-null.name: If he actually cared about you, wouldn't he have rescued you by now?

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__22-null-null.name: Stop making excuses. If you want to change your destiny, I have a gift for you...

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__24-null-null.name: This shadow seed will grant you the power of the $npcName:11001811$.

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__25-null-null.name: You will become the scion of the darkness itself.

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__26-null-null.name: The $npcName:11001815$ has abandoned you. But with this strength, you won't need him ever again.

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__27-null-null.name: Accept this gift... and save $npcName:11000523$ with your own hands!

52000055_QD__DARKWINDMOVIE__0-null-null.name: Warning. Multiple unidentified life forms detected. Inbound towards Kerning City.

52000055_QD__DARKWINDMOVIE__2-null-null.name: It's our early response radar system, Sir. It's detecting a level 3... no, a level 2 security breach!

52000055_QD__DARKWINDMOVIE__3-null-null.name: Analyzing life forms now... We should know what we're up against in a moment.

52000055_QD__DARKWINDMOVIE__4-null-null.name: Pattern recognition failed. Category NULL. Cannot proceed with target analysis.

52000055_QD__DARKWINDMOVIE__6-null-null.name: Whatever it is, it doesn't want to be identified.

52000055_QD__DARKWINDMOVIE__7-null-null.name: The life forms have broken through the city's perimeter defenses. They're coming from all sides!

52000055_QD__DARKWINDMOVIE__8-null-null.name: Wh-what do we do, Captain? Most of our agents are out searching for $npcName:11000064$!

52000055_QD__DARKWINDMOVIE__9-null-null.name: Calm down. Deploy all available agents into the streets of Kerning City.

52000055_QD__DARKWINDMOVIE__10-null-null.name: Also, as captain of Dark Wind...

52000055_QD__DARKWINDMOVIE__11-null-null.name: I am issuing protocol Black Mushroom.

52000055_QD__DARKWINDMOVIE__13-null-null.name: Yes. Kerning City is about to become a battlefield.

52000056_QD__50001460__1-null-null.name: Huh, that person...? Do they need help?

52000057_QD__GUIDESCENE_01__0-null-null.name: $npcName:11001869$! No need to go! I'm here!

52000057_QD__GUIDESCENE_01__1-null-null.name: Oh, you have a guest! Well, since I'm here, you got anything you need enchanted?

52000057_QD__GUIDESCENE_01__2-null-null.name: You know that you can enchant from your inventory window, too, right?

52000058_QD__MAIN__0-null-null.name: Wh-what's going on? The island is shaking!

52000058_QD__MAIN__2-null-null.name: I-I'm not sure... I wonder what's going on...

52000062_QD__GUIDESCENE_01__0-null-null.name: Welcome! Is this your first time at our boutique?

52000062_QD__GUIDESCENE_01__1-null-null.name: There's no need to be shy! Don't feel burdened! Come over here!

52000062_QD__GUIDESCENE_01__3-null-null.name: It looks so good on you!

52000062_QD__GUIDESCENE_01__4-null-null.name: The design... The fit... It's perfect!

52000063_QD__90000640__0-null-null.name: Welcome, one and all, to the (unofficial) MapleCar Racing Circuit!

52000063_QD__90000640__1-null-null.name: The race will begin soon. Racers, come to the starting line!

52000063_QD__90000640__3-null-null.name: Anyone want to race in my super car? Anyone? Anyone?!

52000063_QD__90000640__4-null-null.name: Are you all ready to race?

52000063_QD__90000640__7-null-null.name: Wow! You actually finished! I'm amazed!

52000066_QD__CHASE01__2-null-null.name: A trap! Gotta find a way through...

52000066_QD__CHASE01__3-null-null.name: I bet that lever will call another cart.

52000067_QD__MAIN__2-null-null.name: But that's what we have the Black Mushroom protocol for.

52000067_QD__MAIN__3-null-null.name: The package should be arriving just about now...

52000067_QD__MAIN__4-null-null.name: Behold, the ultimate weapon. Crafted using advanced Taliskar technology, I present the MK 52 Alpha.

52000067_QD__MAIN__5-null-null.name: It technically hasn't been cleared for combat use, but these are desperate times.

52000067_QD__MAIN__6-null-null.name: I'm entrusting you with the MK 52. The survival of Kerning City is in your hands!

52000067_QD__MAIN__8-null-null.name: Don't let them rally their forces!

52000067_QD__MAIN__16-null-null.name: The damage to the city isn't minimal, but we suffered no casualties thanks to you.

52000067_QD__MAIN__17-null-null.name: Who were they and why were they targeting Kerning City? These questions are now my top priority.

52000067_QD__MAIN__18-null-null.name: The MK 52 is scrap... for now. At least it held out through this battle.

52000067_QD__MAIN__19-null-null.name: In fact, this made an excellent field test for it. And the city is safe, so I'd call that a win.

52000067_QD__MAIN__20-null-null.name: But that's enough of that. Let's go inside. I have something to ask you.

52000067_QD__MAIN__21-null-null.name: That should be plenty of combat data for her... and for him.

52000067_QD__SUB_EVENT_01__2-null-null.name: You'll never make it with that attitude!

52000067_QD__SUB_EVENT_01__5-null-null.name: Pinch a penny, make a penny!

52000067_QD__SUB_EVENT_01__6-null-null.name: What are you doing? Repeat after me!

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE__1-null-null.name: Is that $npcName:11001698$? I didn't know her army was so strong...

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE__2-null-null.name: Come on, $npcName:11000523$... We need those reinforcements...

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE__3-null-null.name: $MyPCName$, we have to buy her as much time as we can!

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE__4-null-null.name: Soldiers, with me! Hold the line!

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE__5-null-null.name: We've got wounded soldiers on our flank! $MyPCName$, get them on their feet!

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE__6-null-null.name: Just hold out a bit longer!

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE__8-null-null.name: Oh jeez, look at that. $MyPCName$, you get that guy. I'll get the little ones!

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE__9-null-null.name: We'll hold the walls. $MyPCName$, go after them!

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE__1-null-nu.name: This wasn't a battle. It was a slaughter.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE__2-null-nu.name: $MyPCName$! It's you! I haven't seen you since the caravan attack.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE__3-null-nu.name: There's no time to chat. Joddy... He's hurt! He jumped in front of a fireball to save the rest of us... Fool...

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE__4-null-nu.name: I'll do what I can to help him!

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__1-null.name: ...and the guards who laid down their lives to protect Tria... They were true heroes.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__2-null.name: If they hadn't held the line, Tria would have fallen.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__3-null.name: We can't let their sacrifices be in vain, can we?

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__4-null.name: No, we can't. If $npcName:11001698$ is one of these "Seven Commanders," then that means there are six more commanders to worry about.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__5-null.name: If we're going to survive, we need to set aside our differences and work together.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__6-null.name: In that case, please, lend me your ears.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__7-null.name: There are certain... facts about myself and my station that I'm not free to share with you.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__8-null.name: $npcName:11001812$, leader of the Seven Heroes, feared these facts and what they meant for the future...

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__9-null.name: But it is not yet time for those facts to come to light.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__10-nul.name: Instead, let me offer you a promise. When the time is right, I will tell you everything. I swear it.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__11-nul.name: Until then, I ask you to trust me.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__12-nul.name: We face an enemy with the ambition and power to threaten all of Maple World.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__13-nul.name: To honor the heroes who have fallen and to protect Maple World, we must make a stand.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__14-nul.name: We must set aside our old feuds and pool our strengths. If you will join in a new alliance with me...

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__15-nul.name: Then I will offer you all of the support I can as empress.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__16-nul.name: Our war against the darkness begins today.

52000069_QD__TRIA_BUNKER__0-null-null.name: They broke straight through the walls. Hurry! Before the guards are overwhelmed!

52000069_QD__TRIA_BUNKER__1-null-null.name: Push through! To the end of the hallway!

52000069_QD__TRIA_BUNKER__2-null-null.name: Stand firm! We are the last line of defense against the darkness!

52000069_QD__TRIA_BUNKER__5-null-null.name: Thank you, $MyPCName$, $npcName:11000064$, everyone. Without your courage, Tria would be...

52000069_QD__TRIA_BUNKER__6-null-null.name: With all due respect, Empress, you should be thanking $npcName:11000523$. If she hadn't warned us, the enemy would have overwhelmed us before we knew they were coming.

52000069_QD__TRIA_BUNKER__7-null-null.name: You don't think this is over, do you?

52000069_QD__TRIA_BUNKER__9-null-null.name: I haven't even started to play, and you guys want to pack up for the day? I'm hurt!

52000069_QD__TRIA_BUNKER__10-null-null.name: You are $npcName:11001698$ of the Seven Commanders. $npcName:11000069$ told me about you.

52000069_QD__TRIA_BUNKER__11-null-null.name: Oh, that little girl told you about us? I've gotta give it to her. She's got connections!

52000069_QD__TRIA_BUNKER__12-null-null.name: But I don't care if our secret is out. Starting today, the Seven Commanders are in charge, and you're not!

52000069_QD__TRIA_BUNKER__13-null-null.name: See, you're a big, bad monster, so we're going to seal you up. It's for the good of Maple World, after all!

52000069_QD__TRIA_BUNKER__14-null-null.name: Wh-what...? It's... it's the light of destruction...!

52000069_QD__TRIA_BUNKER__15-null-null.name: Fine, be that way. I'm leaving!

52000070_QD__TRAP01__0-null-null.name: Thought you had this room all figured out, huh?

52000070_QD__TRAP01__1-null-null.name: We saw your Humblis buddies staking out the building. Too bad they didn't know about this entrance!

52000070_QD__TRAP01__2-null-null.name: How'd they get past us? Another secret door?

52000070_QD__TRAP01__3-null-null.name: We'll clean up here. Go report to $npcName:11001822$.

52000076_QD__MAIN__4-null-null.name: You all need to stop fighting and just listen to me.

52000076_QD__MAIN__5-null-null.name: There's so much we didn't know. Let $npcName:11000044$ explain. Please!

52000076_QD__MAIN__6-null-null.name: Have you lost your mind? $npcName:11000044$ is the enemy! He killed your father, and he nearly killed us, too!

52000076_QD__MAIN__7-null-null.name: I don't know what you said to her, $npcName:11000044$, but you won't fool me!

52000076_QD__MAIN__8-null-null.name: Are you so afraid of the truth, $npcName:11001236$? Even when it's right in front of you, you refuse to open your eyes.

52000076_QD__MAIN__9-null-null.name: Little matter. You'll die by my hands no matter what you believe.

52000076_QD__MAIN__10-null-null.name: I will entrust $npcName:11000523$ with the truth. But you... You will die!

52000076_QD__MAIN__11-null-null.name: $npcName:11000044$! Please stop! Even if the others don't believe you, I do...

52000076_QD__MAIN__12-null-null.name: But if we're going to save the world, we all have to work together. Please, $npcName:11000044$... Can't we go back to the way we were?

52000076_QD__MAIN__13-null-null.name: The three of us... We swore we'd always be able to believe in each other...

52000076_QD__MAIN__18-null-null.name: And the lives of the people of Tria...

52000076_QD__MAIN__20-null-null.name: $npcName:11000523$, it is up to you to decide how you'll use what I've told you. But I doubt your allies will believe a thing you say.

52000076_QD__MAIN__21-null-null.name: To change the future, you have to give up your present.

52000076_QD__MAIN__23-null-null.name: What... What is going on here?

52000076_QD__MAIN__24-null-null.name: $npcName:11000523$! What, exactly, did $npcName:11000044$ say to you?

52000076_QD__MAIN__25-null-null.name: I promise I'll tell you everything. But first, we have more important things to do.

52000076_QD__MAIN__26-null-null.name: Follow me. There's no time to waste. Thousands of lives are on the line!

52000076_QD__MAIN__27-null-null.name: Is that what he meant? The people of Tria are in danger?

52000076_QD__MAIN__29-null-null.name: The forces of darkness are marching on Tria!

63000041_CS__MAIN__0-null-null.name: Gee wiz, I didn't think it'd be so spooky out here...

63000041_CS__MAIN__2-null-null.name: Oh man... Did you hear something?

63000041_CS__MAIN__9-null-null.name: $npcName:11003344$? From cadet training? What are you doing here?

63000041_CS__MAIN__11-null-null.name: The rest of you, follow me!

63000041_CS__MAIN__12-null-null.name: Just ahead... it's a trap! We need to form up and protect the caravan!

63000041_CS__MAIN__14-null-null.name: There's no time. Help us hold them off!

63000041_CS__MAIN__15-null-null.name: Uh... Maybe I should fall back with the others...

63000041_CS__MAIN__16-null-null.name: You haven't changed. What about you, mercenary?

63000041_CS__MAIN__18-null-null.name: You've got to buy us time. Just until the captain gets here.

63000041_CS__MAIN__19-null-null.name: I'll get the others to safety.

63000041_CS__MAIN__20-null-null.name: As for you, $npcName:11003344$... Stay out of the way.

63000041_CS__MAIN__23-null-null.name: Look at this! Some of the little bugs survived!

63000041_CS__MAIN__24-null-null.name: I'm getting sick of playing with you pests.

63000041_CS__MAIN__27-null-null.name: What the? That spell should've knocked you out! Boo!

63000041_CS__MAIN__28-null-null.name: Hm... You aren't like the other little bugs.

63000041_CS__MAIN__29-null-null.name: Hm... You aren't like the other little bugs.

63000041_CS__MAIN__32-null-null.name: Aw. You weren't so tough, after all.

63000041_CS__MAIN__33-null-null.name: Aw. You weren't so tough, after all.

63000041_CS__MAIN__34-null-null.name: But... why do I feel like there's a connection between this little bug and me...?

63000041_CS__MAIN__35-null-null.name: But... why do I feel like there's a connection between this little bug and me...?

63000041_CS__MAIN__37-null-null.name: Get outta here, Red Cape. I'm not in the mood!

63000041_CS__MAIN__38-null-null.name: We've got new orders. It's time to go.

63000041_CS__MAIN__39-null-null.name: I said I'm not in the mood!

63000041_CS__MAIN__40-null-null.name: That's too bad. The others are waiting for you.

63000041_CS__MAIN__41-null-null.name: Ugh... And I was just starting to have fun...

63000041_CS__MAIN__42-null-null.name: If you're worried about your plaything over there, I'll finish $male:him,female:her$ off for you.

63000041_CS__MAIN__43-null-null.name: I've already taken care of it. Just open your stupid portal.

63000041_CS__MAIN__44-null-null.name: Little Luka will take care of you, bug.

63000041_CS__MAIN__47-null-null.name: I still have things to do!

63000041_CS__MAIN__49-null-null.name: I don't remember how the fight ended.

63000041_CS__MAIN__53-null-null.name: I woke up on the road to Tria.

63000041_CS__MAIN__54-null-null.name: We had to get to the capital and report what had happened.

63000042_CS__WAKEUP01__1-null-null.name: You were the least wounded among those who were attacked crossing the mountain trail... But I was worried the injury might be severe because you took so long to regain consciousness.

63000042_CS__WAKEUP01__2-null-null.name: Anyway, now that you're awake, I'm relieved. Take some time to recover.

63000042_CS__WAKEUP01__3-null-null.name: I heard you crossed the dangerous mountain trail for the ceremony... It's been canceled.

02000391_BF__MAIN__0-null-null.name: Where be she, my bonnie lass?

02000391_BF__MAIN__1-null-null.name: There! The most beautiful fish in the sea!

02000391_BF__MAIN__2-null-null.name: No more will ye spurn my love! You're comin' with me, one way or t'other!

02000391_BF__MAIN__3-null-null.name: Ugh. How many times do I have to tell you? I don't date pirates.

02000391_BF__MAIN__6-null-null.name: ♬ O magicked waves, reveal my cave! ♬

02000391_BF__MAIN__7-null-null.name: That oaf will never find me here...

02000391_BF__MAIN__8-null-null.name: Aaak! Where be my scaly maiden fair?

02000391_BF__MAIN__9-null-null.name: Find her, or I'll boil the lot of ye!

02000392_BF__SUMMON__1-null-null.name: $npcName:11003084$! Landwalker, I will not forgive you!

02000392_BF__MAIN__0-null-null.name: What...?! Ugh...You're tough for a pirate...!

02000392_BF__MAIN__2-null-null.name: $npcName:11000444$ the explorer said you could help me.

02000392_BF__MAIN__3-null-null.name: $npcName:11000444$...? $npcName:11003084$, I thought I told you not to see that human again!

02000392_BF__MAIN__4-null-null.name: Oh... I guess you're not a pirate.

02000392_BF__MAIN__5-null-null.name: I'm really sorry about the misunderstanding.

02000392_BF__MAIN__6-null-null.name: Sorry, we've had a lot of pirate trouble lately...

02000392_BF__MAIN__7-null-null.name: $npcName:11003086$, Guardian of the Seas, says the same.

02000392_BF__MAIN__8-null-null.name: It'd be best if you spoke with him in merson.

02000392_BF__MAIN__9-null-null.name: Perhaps we can convince him to grant you an audience!

02000392_BF__MAIN__10-null-null.name: Here, proof that he sent me.

02000392_BF__MAIN__11-null-null.name: So why have you come here?

02000392_BF__MAIN__12-null-null.name: $npcName:11000444$ claims this world is on the brink of disaster.

02000384_BF__BARRICADE__0-null-null.name: The entrance will close in 30 seconds.

02000386_BF__MAIN__2-null-null.name: Attack Pippy before he gets away!

02000401_BF__FACTION_01__0-null-null.name: You need to destroy the turrets to capture the bridge!

02000401_BF__FACTION_02__0-null-null.name: Royal Guard combat horses! Avenge the Royal Guards!

02000401_BF__FACTION_03__0-null-null.name: We can't let the Maple Alliance steal the show.\nTaliskar will step in now.

02000401_BF__FACTION_04__0-null-null.name: MK 52 Omega, landing successful.\nUnion, this is a present from Dr. Kartronic.

02000401_BF__MADRICANSIEGE__0-null-null.name: For the alliance army to congregate, we need to take over the bridge!\nLet's move!

02000401_BF__MADRICANSIEGE__2-null-null.name: A secret tunnel? Here? How unexpected.\nWe wouldn't even need to crush the ramparts...

02000401_BF__MADRICANSIEGE__3-null-null.name: But we won't be able to get many soldiers in through here.

02000401_BF__MADRICANSIEGE__4-null-null.name: We've got this spot. You go on ahead and infiltrate the fortress.

02000403_BF__EVENT_01__0-null-null.name: I sense... a remnant of the past.\nIt's a vision of an old mansion.

02000403_BF__EVENT_02__1-null-null.name: Well, no matter. I'm sure you're curious about this place as well...

02000403_BF__EVENT_02__2-null-null.name: Can you feel it? These powerful evil spirits... It's rare to come across so many spirits. They must carry a strong grudge.

02000403_BF__EVENT_02__3-null-null.name: Welcome to the Cursed Mansion. I hope you find the answer you seek...

02000403_BF__EVENT_02__4-null-null.name: Evil spirits issue forth from the magic circle in the center of the hall.\nDefeat them to purify the mansion.

02000403_BF__EVENT_02__5-null-null.name: I will make this place sparkle!

02000403_BF__EVENT_02__6-null-null.name: I'm so happy to work here!

02000403_BF__EVENT_02__7-null-null.name: Mistress hates bugs. I need to keep things clean.

02000403_BF__MAGIC_01__1-null-null.name: Cough... I think I'm coming down with something...

02000403_BF__MAGIC_02__1-null-null.name: Our lady is very sick. He must be too worried to eat...

02000403_BF__MAGIC_03__1-null-null.name: ...The fever is not going down... This is bad.

02000403_BF__MAGIC_04__1-null-null.name: Where can I find a good book to read to my daughter...?

02000403_BF__MAGIC_05__3-null-null.name: We need to cure her, no matter what!

02000403_BF__MAGIC_06__0-null-null.name: Can... can we cure this disease...?!

02000403_BF__MAGIC_06__1-null-null.name: Right now,  $npcName:11001812$ is working on his research as best as he can.

02000403_BF__MAGIC_06__2-null-null.name: Minister...! Please persuade the empress not to abandon her realm!

02000403_BF__MAGIC_06__3-null-null.name: We can't all die just here...We need to save whatever salvageable land we can.

02000403_BF__MAGIC_06__5-null-null.name: Let's go back, $npcName:11000525$. Forget this place now.

02000403_BF__MAGIC_06__6-null-null.name: But... but I made a promise to the lady!

02000403_BF__MAGIC_06__7-null-null.name: Stop whining. You sound like a baby.

02000410_BF__BARRICADE_GIVEUP_0-null-nul.name: The entrance will be closed in 30 seconds.\nStarting now, the party leader can no longer forfeit the dungeon.

02000419_BF__BARRICADE__0-null-null.name: The entrance will close in 30 seconds.

02000403_BF__MAIN__0-null-null.name: A powerful source of evil has appeared in the center of the hall.

02010055_BF__SCENE01__1-null-null.name: Still, this power will allow me to become the kaiser. Finally, I will rule over Grandis!

52000081_QD__MAIN__1-null-null.name: Hm... This is definitely the place...

52000081_QD__MAIN__4-null-null.name: Traipsing so blindly into danger is going to get you killed.

52000081_QD__MAIN__5-null-null.name: You should turn back now, while you still can.

52000081_QD__MAIN__6-null-null.name: Wait! I have something to ask you!

52000081_QD__MAIN__7-null-null.name: Were you the one our expedition encountered?

52000081_QD__MAIN__8-null-null.name: They were here investigating a weather anomaly.

52000081_QD__MAIN__9-null-null.name: That is, until they were attacked by someone matching your description.

52000081_QD__MAIN__10-null-null.name: Why did you attack them? Why are the forces of darkness here?

52000081_QD__MAIN__11-null-null.name: Your friends were standing in the way of my mission.

52000081_QD__MAIN__12-null-null.name: There's someone I must eliminate with my own two hands...

52000081_QD__MAIN__13-null-null.name: I'll show no mercy to anyone who stands in my way.

52000081_QD__MAIN__15-null-null.name: You should trust your instincts and leave this place.

52000081_QD__MAIN__16-null-null.name: Someone like you could never survive that deadly cold.

52000083_QD__MAIN__1-null-null.name: Your aid is unnecessary. I could have handled things alone.

52000083_QD__MAIN__2-null-null.name: I think the words you're looking for are "thank you."

52000083_QD__MAIN__3-null-null.name: She looks hurt... Hey, are you okay?

52000083_QD__MAIN__6-null-null.name: Yes, thanks to you. I don't know what would've happened if you hadn't come...

52000083_QD__MAIN__8-null-null.name: No. Their leader has been manipulating Queen $npcName:11003074$. We have to stop him.

52000083_QD__MAIN__10-null-null.name: After the loss of her kingdom and King $npcName:11003075$, $npcName:11003074$ dwelt here alone in sadness. Until he appeared.

52000083_QD__MAIN__11-null-null.name: He promised to reunite $npcName:11003074$ with $npcName:11003075$ if she opened the path to the secret shrine. He showed her $npcName:11003075$'s bracelet—a gift from $npcName:11003074$—as proof of his claims.

52000083_QD__MAIN__12-null-null.name: Eventually, $npcName:11003074$'s sadness became too much for her, and she agreed to take him to the secret shrine on $map:02000381$. Then they left.

52000083_QD__MAIN__13-null-null.name: I tried to stop him from leaving with her, but his minions were too strong.

52000083_QD__MAIN__14-null-null.name: Can you describe him to me?

52000083_QD__MAIN__15-null-null.name: I never saw his face because of that black hood, but... he looked like a ghost.

52000083_QD__MAIN__17-null-null.name: Wait, are you really going to run off on your own again?

52000083_QD__MAIN__18-null-null.name: If we're both going after the forces of darkness, we should do it together...

52000083_QD__MAIN__19-null-null.name: Turka's life is mine to end.

52000084_QD__1122330_FINDWAY__0-null-nul.name: Hurry! We have to hurry and get up the mountain.

52000084_QD__1122330_FINDWAY__1-null-nul.name: $npc:11003074$ is at the shrine hidden at the top of this mountain!

52000085_QD__50001538__1-null-null.name: Unfortunately, I don't have time to give each of our guests a proper greeting. There are matters I must attend.

52000085_QD__50001538__2-null-null.name: Wait. I thought the reason you came here was to help me?

52000085_QD__50001538__4-null-null.name: Hehehe... Why do you think I wanted you to bring me here, of all places?

52000085_QD__50001538__5-null-null.name: Two things are required to unseal the temple doors...

52000085_QD__50001538__7-null-null.name: You finally understand. Your Majesty, you are the final key.

52000085_QD__50001538__8-null-null.name: Release the seal and throw open the door to the Frostpillar Temple.

52000085_QD__50001538__9-null-null.name: Your beloved companion awaits you there.

52000085_QD__50001538__11-null-null.name: My queen! You mustn't! If you open the door to the Frostpillar Temple... The Frozen Crystal might explode!

52000085_QD__50001538__13-null-null.name: Your Majesty, if you would be so kind as to dispatch those noisy whelps, I will deal with our newest guest.

52000085_QD__50001538__14-null-null.name: Does your treachery know no end?

52000085_QD__50001538__15-null-null.name: My, what an unexpected face... Have you come all this way to find me? Ehehehe...

52000085_QD__50001538__16-null-null.name: There's nowhere to run. This day will be your last.

52000085_QD__50001538__17-null-null.name: Run? Ahahaha... What confidence! All right, I'll play along.

52000085_QD__50001538__18-null-null.name: Let's spend a little time together, just you and I. What do you say, disgraced bladesman?

52000085_QD__50001538__20-null-null.name: My Queen, you can't throw away everything for the words of a stranger. Especially while the king remains missing...

52000085_QD__50001538__21-null-null.name: But $npcName:11003075$ is who I've come here to find.

52000085_QD__50001538__23-null-null.name: I'm sorry, but I must see my beloved. If you would stand against me, you leave me no choice!

52000085_QD__50001538__25-null-null.name: My Queen, you cannot release the temple's seal on the words of a stranger whose motives remain unknown. Let me take you home where you can rest...

52000085_QD__50001538__28-null-null.name: What do we now? Have we failed?

52000085_QD__50001538__29-null-null.name: This ice was conjured with $npcName:11003074$'s magic... It would take a special potion to melt it...

52000085_QD__50001538__30-null-null.name: How long will we be stuck like this?

52000085_QD__50001538__31-null-null.name: You fool. Didn't I tell you your self-righteousness would get you killed?

52000085_QD__50001538__33-null-null.name: I appreciate you saving us, but what are you doing here?

52000085_QD__50001538__34-null-null.name: I followed you here because of what that $male:guy,female:girl$ said... Dark forces this,  end-of-the-world that... I was worried you idiots would hurt yourselves!

52000085_QD__50001538__35-null-null.name: It's okay, $MyPCName$. Surmany may act mean, but it's only because he cares about us.

52000085_QD__50001538__36-null-null.name: Don't be ridiculous! I just don't want the world ending on my watch.

52000085_QD__50001538__37-null-null.name: Thanks, Surmany. And $MyPCName$... Thank you for everything you've done.

52000085_QD__50001538__38-null-null.name: Things are looking grim. We should regroup at the outpost and think.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__0-null-nu.name: Thank you all for joining me today.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__1-null-nu.name: These past fifteen years, we've allowed ourselves to grow apart, and $npc:11001698$ has taken advantage of this fact.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__2-null-nu.name: I invite everyone here to come together to form a new Maple Alliance, dedicated to the protection of the light and our people.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__3-null-nu.name: That's a beautiful thought, Empress, but we need to face facts.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__4-null-nu.name: The enemy's hit all of us, and hit us hard. Even after combining our forces, we're coming up short.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__5-null-nu.name: I hate to admit it, but $npcName:11001822$ is right. It's going to take time before my guards are back up to full strength.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__6-null-nu.name: We can't just sit here and do nothing!

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__7-null-nu.name: Calm yourself. We have to weigh our options carefully.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__8-null-nu.name: I'm more concerned about how little we know about our enemies...

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__9-null-nu.name: She's right. I've set Dark Wind to digging up anything we can on $npcName:11001698$, but so far... nothing.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__10-null-n.name: Even looking into $npc:11000044$'s activities turned out to be a dead end. The man knew how to cover his tracks.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__11-null-n.name: So now we're left with no leads, and no answers.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__12-null-n.name: Your Majesty, shall I tell them about the expedition?

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__13-null-n.name: Yes. But first, how many of you know about the lumarigons?

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__14-null-n.name: I've sent what few men I could spare to search for any trace of the lumarigons. This led us to look at Karkar Island.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__15-null-n.name: A dragon-like man has been stirring up trouble there, it seems.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__16-null-n.name: He's been asking around about the lumarigons, as well. I cannot say if this man is an ally or a foe, but we cannot turn a blind eye to him.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__17-null-n.name: Since he tends to leave chaos in his wake, we need to be careful in how we proceed.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__18-null-n.name: There's so much work ahead of us. We need to learn more about $npcName:11001698$, build up our armies, care for our people... And every one of these tasks is important.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__19-null-n.name: But this man on Karkar Island may hold the answers to our questions.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__20-null-n.name: Your Majesty, our forces are already stretched too thin. How can we spare anyone to look for this dragon man?

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__21-null-n.name: We will find a way. We must.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__22-null-n.name: The very fate of our alliance may depend on this mission.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__23-null-n.name: Urrrggg, I really don't want to teleport. Tria is so far.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__24-null-n.name: Anyway... I, $npc:11003137$, have arrived under the command of the empress. Ah, so you were here as well, $MyPCName$?

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__25-null-n.name: I'll head off first. $MyPCName$, follow along! There's lots to be done.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__26-null-n.name: We were victorious over $npcName:11001698$. Those that attacked Tria and Maple World got what they deserved.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__27-null-n.name: Although $npcName:11001698$ escaped safely, it wasn't what she wanted.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__28-null-n.name: $npc:11001698$ lost her closest friend in this battle.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__29-null-n.name: Ack... I... I can't believe I lost...

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__30-null-n.name: Hurry and end it, you idiots...! I'll never become your prisoner...!

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__31-null-n.name: Slaves of light…! I'd rather die than become a hypocrite like you!

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__32-null-n.name: With that, we landed a final hit on $npcName:11001698$. It was vengenace for the royal guards of Tria! And for $npcName:11003178$.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__35-null-n.name: But $npcName:11001698$ was safe, after all. Her dragon, $npcName:11003144$, took the final blow in her place.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__36-null-n.name: Not just that, but Lukarax use the final bit of her strength to teleport $npcName:11001698$ to safety. To protect her...

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__39-null-n.name: Luka! I'm coming! I'm going to go with $npcName:11003144$, too!

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__41-null-n.name: $npcName:11001698$ cried out for her dragon until she disappeared, and that marked the end of the Madrakan battle.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__42-null-n.name: $npcName:11001698$ will surely return. And when that happens, all who we love will be in danger once more.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__43-null-n.name: But we're searching for resolution that doesn't involve fighting $npcName:11001698$. Vengeance will only lead to ruin, for both sides.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__44-null-n.name: Therefore I vowed to thoroughly investigate the "Destruction From Light" that awakened the rage within $npcName:11001698$.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__45-null-n.name: Little did I know what the results of that vow would be. There was no way to tell then.

52000091_QD__52000091_TRIGGER__2-null-nu.name: Fine! Let them attack us. I'd like to see them try.

52000091_QD__52000091_TRIGGER__3-null-nu.name: We'll squish them all like the pests they are!

52000093_QD__20002281_RP__0-null-null.name: While $npcName:11001822$ and Dark Wind were repelling $npcName:11001698$'s army, Oska and the militia were fighting another army at Shadow Canyon.

52000094_QD__20002280_RP__0-null-null.name: Meanwhile, $npcName:11001822$ and his Dark Wind forces were fighting $npcName:11001698$'s army in an empty field.

52000096_QD__MAIN__2-null-null.name: Get down here! You're only making things worse for yourself.

52000096_QD__MAIN__3-null-null.name: The captain wants to see you!

52000097_QD__MAIN__0-null-null.name: $npcName:11003086$. This guy is different from those pirates. Tell this person what you told me last time.

52000097_QD__MAIN__1-null-null.name: You look so different. Scared me there. If something dangerous is happening, let me know. Who knows? It might get resolved.

52000097_QD__MAIN__2-null-null.name: How naive of you, $npcName:11003085$. To want to help the humans... You don't know how pointless that is.

52000097_QD__MAIN__3-null-null.name: Humans will be the ones to push this world into extinction.

52000097_QD__MAIN__4-null-null.name: Although humans may not be the most perfect creatures...

52000097_QD__MAIN__5-null-null.name: They will not try to ruin this world if it's in danger.

52000097_QD__MAIN__6-null-null.name: Spare me. Humans can't even trust each other. They're too selfish.

52000097_QD__MAIN__7-null-null.name: Thanks to the returned mage of light, I've learned everything. I know of the destruction you'll bring to the world.

52000097_QD__MAIN__9-null-null.name: Don't believe me? Then see for yourself.

52000097_QD__MAIN__11-null-null.name: Come to your senses, little guy!

52000097_QD__MAIN__14-null-null.name: What you showed me... I'm still not sure what it means.

52000097_QD__MAIN__15-null-null.name: But if someone's poor choices leads to a crisis...

52000097_QD__MAIN__16-null-null.name: Others will pool forces to block it. Please keep that in mind.

52000097_QD__MAIN__18-null-null.name: Fine, I'll keep an eye out. I'll watch and see how whatever disaster comes next is handled.

52000097_QD__MAIN__19-null-null.name: But I wonder what the other Shinsoos will think of you... What they do is fully up to them. Remember that.

52000097_QD__MAIN__20-null-null.name: He's usually quite friendly... There must be a reason for his actions. Don't take it to the heart.

52000097_QD__MAIN__21-null-null.name: I'll talk it out some more... If there's something I need to tell you, I'll contact you. Also…

52000097_QD__MAIN__22-null-null.name: Would you deliver a message to $npcName:11000444$? Tell him that I hope he gets better soon... And that I'd like to see him again...

52000097_QD__MAIN__23-null-null.name: Are you blushing, $npcName:11003084$? You must like him a lot. He seemed rather ordinary to me...

52000097_QD__MAIN__24-null-null.name: I'll deliver the message. Thank you, $npcName:11003084$. Thank you, $npcName:11003085$.

52000098_QD__EP10MOVIE__0-null-null.name: You've failed to secure Empress $npcName:11001478$... Perhaps I've put too much trust in you, $npcName:11001698$.

52000098_QD__EP10MOVIE__1-null-null.name: But, $npcName:11001811$...! If $npcName:11001698$ had continued to use her strength there... $npcName:11001969$ may have turrned into an empress of destruction...

52000098_QD__EP10MOVIE__2-null-null.name: $npcName:11001811$ wanted $npcName:11001478$ alive and not awakened! $npcName:11001698$ didn't run away!

52000098_QD__EP10MOVIE__3-null-null.name: Also, we damaged their castle. Doesn't this mean $npcName:11001698$ succeeded?

52000098_QD__EP10MOVIE__5-null-null.name: You're a fool if you thought I'd give you a pat on the back for your failure.

52000098_QD__EP10MOVIE__6-null-null.name: You are as good as dead.

52000098_QD__EP10MOVIE__8-null-null.name: You've lost your troops and made the enemy aware of our actions... Where exactly is the silver lining on that?

52000098_QD__EP10MOVIE__10-null-null.name: Enough. I don't remember taking in such pitiful subordinates.

52000098_QD__EP10MOVIE__11-null-null.name: This is your last chance, $npcName:11001698$. This time, succeed.

52000098_QD__EP10MOVIE__12-null-null.name: Remember, there are 6 others who would love to use your failure as a stepping stone to their own success.

52000098_QD__EP10MOVIE__13-null-null.name: Fight with $npcName:11003144$ this time. I didn't give you that dragon for a pet.

52010006_QD__MAIN__10-null-null.name: Hey, you! I don't know who you are, but help me! I can't leave without my necklace!

52010011_QD__ACT01__0-null-null.name: So, you're the one who helped my granddaughter. She has an eye for people...

52010011_QD__ACT01__1-null-null.name: There's something special about you. Did you know that?

52010011_QD__ACT01__2-null-null.name: I'm not here for a reading, but... How so?

52010011_QD__ACT01__3-null-null.name: Even if I were to tell you, you wouldn't understand. It's something you will have to discover for yourself.

52010011_QD__ACT01__4-null-null.name: Now, I understand you're looking for the creature who came seeking the Lumenstone.

52010011_QD__ACT01__6-null-null.name: I don't know where he went, but I do know where he came from. He belongs to a race of dragons called the nova.

52010011_QD__ACT01__7-null-null.name: The goddesses created many worlds beyond Maple World, and the nova come from one such world called Grandis.

52010011_QD__ACT01__9-null-null.name: Indeed. In the past, it was possible to cross between worlds through interdimensional doors.

52010011_QD__ACT01__10-null-null.name: But those doors vanished with the goddesses. How did such a person make it here? That is a mystery.

52010011_QD__ACT01__11-null-null.name: But what does he want? Why come all this way for the Lumenstone?

52010011_QD__ACT01__12-null-null.name: I can't rightly say. He called himself $npcName:11003053$, and as he left, he chanted...

52010011_QD__ACT01__14-null-null.name: I believe that is the protector of the nova royal family. Why would he want to become their guardian?

52010011_QD__ACT01__15-null-null.name: He hungers for power. I could tell that much from the look in his eyes.

52010011_QD__ACT01__16-null-null.name: Trouble! We're in trouble! We found Mika... but so did that monster!

52010011_QD__ACT01__18-null-null.name: In the sanctum of Nazkar Temple! You have to hurry!

52010011_QD__ACT01__20-null-null.name: Will do. I'll leave Mika to you!

99999909__EVENT_01__0-null-null.name: I can sense the remnants of the past here. It rings throughout this area strongly. An extremely wealthy person lived in this manor.

99999909__EVENT_02__1-null-null.name: Well, no matter. I'm sure you're curious about this place as well...

99999909__EVENT_02__2-null-null.name: Can you feel it? These powerful evil spirits... It's rare to come across so many spirits. They must carry a strong grudge.

99999909__EVENT_02__3-null-null.name: Welcome to the Cursed Mansion. I hope you find the answer you seek...

99999909__EVENT_02__4-null-null.name: Countless spirits have appeared in the middle of the hall through the magic seal. Let's search the manor to see if there are other magic seals in this area.

99999911__MAIN__0-null-null.name: Avoid the flying projectiles and survive until the end. That's the rule.

99999925__MAIN__0-null-null.name: I'll transform you. Stealthily defeat the pirates with your changed abilities.

99999949__07_DETECTLIFTABLEOBJECT__0-nul.name: Choosing between the wooden box and the rock, move the object that meets the conditions to the sparkling area.

DUNGEON__GIVEUP__TIME__0-null-null.name: The party leader may now choose to abandon the dungeon.

UGCMapOX-null-null.name: The OX Quiz event has ended.

02100009_BF__resurrection_1__0-GuildRaid.name: Defeat the other monster before his brother recovers!

02100009_BF__resurrection_2__0-GuildRaid.name: Defeat the other monster before his brother recovers!

02000375_BF__move__0-Kandura-null.name: The lever will disappear in 1 minute.

61000010_ME__main__0-MassiveCrazyRunners.name: Reach the finish line before time runs out.

02100009_BF__text__0-GuildRaid01-null.name: Hemos and Pamos have both submitted to your power!

80000014_bonus__lever__0-TreasureMap01-n.name: The controls for this are in another location.

80000015_bonus__lever__0-TreasureMap01-n.name: The controls for this are in another location.

80000015_bonus__lever2__0-TreasureMap01-.name: The controls for this are in another location.

80000015_bonus__main__0-TreasureMap01-nu.name: Split your party according to the arrows to make your way through the mine's puzzles.

80000014_bonus__main__0-TreasureMap01-nu.name: Deep within this abandoned maze of a mine \nlurks a monster. Find it and defeat it!

FameContents-null-null.name: Let's go somewhere quiet, we have a lot to discuss.

02020019_BF__02020019_main__0-FameChalle.name: Welcome to my combat simulator! I've loaded it up with all of the latest operations manuals and data from our own battles!

02020019_BF__02020019_main__1-FameChalle.name: This test will be really tough. I hope you're ready!

02020019_BF__02020019_main__2-FameChalle.name: Step into the battle arena below to begin.

02020020_BF__02020020_main__0-FameChalle.name: Welcome to my combat simulator! I've loaded it up with all of the latest operations manuals and data from our own battles!

02020020_BF__02020020_main__1-FameChalle.name: This test will be really tough. I hope you're ready!

02020020_BF__02020020_main__2-FameChalle.name: Step into the battle arena below to begin.

02020021_BF__main__0-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Plenty of Dark Wind rookies came here to train.

02020021_BF__main__1-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Sadly, lots of them didn't survive long enough to be full agents...

02020022_BF__main__0-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Plenty of Dark Wind rookies came here to train.

02020022_BF__main__1-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Sadly, lots of them didn't survive long enough to be full agents...

02020023_BF__main__0-FameChallengeDungeo.name: I won't hold back, and neither should you.

02020023_BF__main__1-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Don't think of me as your captain. Think of me as an enemy who must be defeated.

02020024_BF__main__0-FameChallengeDungeo.name: I won't hold back, and neither should you.

02020024_BF__main__1-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Don't think of me as your captain. Think of me as an enemy who must be defeated.

02020025_BF__main__0-FameChallengeDungeo.name: You really think you can beat me, cadet?

02020025_BF__main__1-FameChallengeDungeo.name: It's not too late to give up.

02020025_BF__main__2-FameChallengeDungeo.name: You better not hold back, you hear?

02020026_BF__main__0-FameChallengeDungeo.name: You really think you can beat me, cadet?

02020026_BF__main__1-FameChallengeDungeo.name: It's not too late to give up.

02020026_BF__main__2-FameChallengeDungeo.name: You better not hold back, you hear?

02020027_BF__main__0-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Are you destined to protect this world? Or fail it?

02020028_BF__main__0-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Are you destined to protect this world? Or fail it?

02020020_BF__02020020_battle__0-FameChal.name: Let's start the test. Since it's your first time, I'll lower the battle parameters.

02020020_BF__02020020_battle__1-FameChal.name: I think this should be a better challenge for you.

02020020_BF__02020020_battle__2-FameChal.name: This is today's last test. Hold out a little longer!

02020020_BF__02020020_battle__3-FameChal.name: Thanks for participating in today's test. I'm expecting you to do even better next time!

52010038_QD__allert__0-FameContents-null.name: Protect the engineers so they can get the ship ready to fly!

52010038_QD__event__4-FameContents-null.name: $MyPCName$, are you okay?! They must have rigged it to blow...

52010038_QD__gauge__3-FameContents-null.name: Launch preparations complete! All hands, board the ship immediately!

52010038_QD__main__4-FameContents-null.name: We're not leaving anyone behind! Treat any injured crew you encounter.

52010038_QD__main__5-FameContents-null.name: The ship won't fly without a reactor. Stop the bombs before they detonate.

52010038_QD__main__6-FameContents-null.name: Phew... the reactor's safe! We could use some more help on the upper levels!

52010038_QD__main__7-FameContents-null.name: Ooooh! That's a prototype of the MK 52 Alpha! It was just sitting in storage?

52010038_QD__main__8-FameContents-null.name: They're after the pulsejet! Defend it or we're dead in the water!

52020036_QD__main__12-FameContents-null.name: There's too many of them! We can't hold out much longer!

52020036_QD__main__13-FameContents-null.name: Good work holding the enemy at bay, kid, but you can stand aside. I'll take it from here.

52020036_QD__main__14-FameContents-null.name: I'll see to it the injured get the medical attention they need. Perion is in your debt!

52020036_QD__main__15-FameContents-null.name: $MyPCName$, we have a fix on your position!

52020036_QD__main__16-FameContents-null.name: We're dropping supplies that should help turn the tides on this battle, as we speak!

52020036_QD__main__17-FameContents-null.name: Crossbows away! Use them in good health.

52020036_QD__main__18-FameContents-null.name: A crossbow? Are you kidding?! Where are the big guns?

52020036_QD__main__19-FameContents-null.name: We can't risk bringing Sky Fortress in close while the enemy's ship is in the air!

52020036_QD__main__20-FameContents-null.name: Hmph... Fine, I'll do everything myself!

52020036_QD__main__22-FameContents-null.name: We've got trouble! Radar is detecting numerous contacts converging on the altar!

52010065_QD__52010065_main__0-FameConten.name: How did you get in here?!

52010065_QD__52010065_main__1-FameConten.name: Making me come to a squalid place like this. Are you happy?

52010065_QD__52010065_main__2-FameConten.name: Hmph, that is as far as you go!

52010065_QD__52010065_main__4-FameConten.name: What a cute and futile effort. Allow me to create a path, master.

52010065_QD__52010065_main__6-FameConten.name: If those would-be heroes keep meddling in my plans...

52010065_QD__52010065_main__7-FameConten.name: I suppose I'll have to send one of my toys up into the sky to deal with them.

LapentaFrontierQuest-null-null.name: I'll go on ahead. Don't be long.

52010056_QD__EventSection__2-FameContent.name: Yes, my brothers... Long have we toiled.

52010056_QD__EventSection__3-FameContent.name: For years we've wandered in search of our true master's blood.

52010056_QD__EventSection__4-FameContent.name: The time of our redemption is at hand!

52010056_QD__EventSection__5-FameContent.name: Soon, our great and terrible master will return!

52010056_QD__EventSection__6-FameContent.name: Alongside $npc:11003821$ we shall burn this world to ash!

52010056_QD__EventSection__7-FameContent.name: Let us unleash an era of terror and destruction that knows no equal!

52010056_QD__EventSection__15-FameConten.name: This place has been twisted by Infernog's evil...

52010056_QD__EventSection__18-FameConten.name: Foolish insect. You've stepped through the gates of hell of your own accord.

52010056_QD__EventSection__20-FameConten.name: Hey, monkey-guy. I don't suppose you could just let me go?

52010056_QD__EventSection__22-FameConten.name: This place will be your grave!

52010056_QD__EventSection__24-FameConten.name: There's only one way out of here...

52010056_QD__EventSection__31-FameConten.name: Not precisely. Just a part of his soul.

52010056_QD__EventSection__32-FameConten.name: Drinking his blood... What a curious decision.

52010056_QD__EventSection__33-FameConten.name: You'll never control me, so stay out of my head, demon!

52010056_QD__EventSection__34-FameConten.name: Control you? Hahaha. That would be too easy. No..

52010056_QD__EventSection__36-FameConten.name: Don't worry, I have no interest in taking over this pathetic body.

52010056_QD__EventSection__37-FameConten.name: It is far more amusing to corrupt than to control...

52010056_QD__EventSection__38-FameConten.name: Let's have some fun, shall we?

52010056_QD__EventSection__39-FameConten.name: Heh. It's been a while since I had any fun!

52010056_QD__EventSection__40-FameConten.name: A fiery power burns within you.

52010056_QD__EventSection__41-FameConten.name: The fire inside you burns hotter.

52010056_QD__EventSection__42-FameConten.name: There's nowhere to run! Prepare to die!

52010056_QD__EventSection__43-FameConten.name: We'll retrieve the master's blood from your battered corpse.

52010056_QD__EventSection__45-FameConten.name: Huh? Is the human suffering some kind of a breakdown?

52010056_QD__EventSection__47-FameConten.name: We've played with them enough. Let's end this.

52010056_QD__EventSection__48-FameConten.name: Is that it? Hah. Time to die!

52010056_QD__EventSection_B__1-FameConte.name: Stop the fleeing $npcName:11003816$ before it calls for backup.

52010063_QD__main__2-FameContents_EP1_02.name: Who are you? How did you reach this place?

52010063_QD__main__3-FameContents_EP1_02.name: Grrr... And you, what were you all doing? How did you allow this pathetic interloper to enter?

52010063_QD__main__6-FameContents_EP1_02.name: You fools. This ritual was already interrupted the moment that meddler arrived.

52010063_QD__main__7-FameContents_EP1_02.name: So long have the insects of his lineage vexed me... Forcing me to go to such lengths to take back what is mine.

52010063_QD__main__8-FameContents_EP1_02.name: No matter... It will be mine again in time. So long as my blood runs within his veins, he belongs to me.

52010063_QD__main__9-FameContents_EP1_02.name: Hear me, loyal servants. I give you the chance to redeem yourselves. Dispatch this interloper.

52010063_QD__main__10-FameContents_EP1_0.name: Carry out my will while I retake what is mine. I will not suffer another failure!

52010063_QD__main__14-FameContents_EP1_0.name: $MyPCName$, I've been monitoring remotely. There may be a solution to our quandary. Return to the carrier with $npcName:11000144$, and join me and the officers in the briefing room.

52010063_QD__main__15-FameContents_EP1_0.name: Are you giving up? You're pathetic! If you can't kill it, keep on hitting it 'til it wishes it were dead! What do you mean I'm too harsh? Let go—*bzzt*

52010062_QD__main__0-FameContents_EP1_02.name: Our master begins to stir. If he awakens now...

52010062_QD__main__1-FameContents_EP1_02.name: It's too soon! ...This is all your fault!

52010062_QD__main__4-FameContents_EP1_02.name: You fools... What have you done?

52010062_QD__main__5-FameContents_EP1_02.name: My power is... incomplete. Explain yourselves!

52010062_QD__main__7-FameContents_EP1_02.name: We collected all of your blood... R-right, brothers?

52010062_QD__main__9-FameContents_EP1_02.name: If what you say is true, then there is only one explanation...

52010062_QD__main__10-FameContents_EP1_0.name: The insects of that accursed family have once more meddled in my affairs...

52010062_QD__main__12-FameContents_EP1_0.name: ...I will take what's mine by force.

52010064_QD__main__1-FameContents_EP1_02.name: Because of me, the Sky Fortress is in danger.

52010064_QD__main__2-FameContents_EP1_02.name: I have to buy them time...

52010064_QD__main__3-FameContents_EP1_02.name: Or else they'll never get to fire the weapon.

52010064_QD__main__4-FameContents_EP1_02.name: That's the only way they'll have a fighting chance.

52010064_QD__main__5-FameContents_EP1_02.name: I know this is reckless, but it's the only shot we've got...

52010061_QD__main__2-FameContents_EP1_02.name: It feels like... the aura of an ancient demon.

52010061_QD__main__3-FameContents_EP1_02.name: $npc:11001567$, we need to locate the source of this evil immediately. If we do not, this world will see a disaster like in days long past.

52010061_QD__main__4-FameContents_EP1_02.name: No, our first priority is sealing the dark energy.

52010061_QD__main__5-FameContents_EP1_02.name: Otherwise our old friend will doubtlessly use it to create a rune of darkness.

52010061_QD__main__7-FameContents_EP1_02.name: Once he has it, the next step is obvious. He'll try awaken the Rune Titan.

52010061_QD__main__8-FameContents_EP1_02.name: This is not a threat we can handle alone.

52010061_QD__main__9-FameContents_EP1_02.name: We need to call on our allies across the sea.

52010055_QD__52010055__0-FameContents-nu.name: Shield of the skies? It's about to be scrap in the dirt!

52010055_QD__52010055__3-FameContents-nu.name: I've got reports of the enemy inside the ship! There's too many of them!

52010055_QD__52010055__5-FameContents-nu.name: Condor, Schatten, and Mason, take care of any enemies who've made it inside!

52010055_QD__52010055__6-FameContents-nu.name: Piece of cake! Leave it to me!

52010055_QD__52010055__8-FameContents-nu.name: Deireadh, it’s time to share your pain.

52010055_QD__52010055__9-FameContents-nu.name: Nairin, your task is to coordinate efforts around the ship and restore order!

52010055_QD__52010055__11-FameContents-n.name: $MyPCName$, dispatch the enemies attempting to breach the deck.

52010055_QD__52010055__12-FameContents-n.name: All crew with combat experience should engage the enemy boarding party.

52010055_QD__52010055__13-FameContents-n.name: But if our entire fighting force is out there, you'll be...

52010055_QD__52010055__14-FameContents-n.name: I can take care of myself.

52010055_QD__52010055__15-FameContents-n.name: Our foes may be many, but we are strong.

52010055_QD__52010055__18-FameContents-n.name: Oh no! I'm detecting a huge group arriving on the deck... I don't think $MyPCName$ can handle them alone...

52010055_QD__52010055__19-FameContents-n.name: Oh! The guns are malfunctioning! We'll have to aim them manually.

52010055_QD__52010055__20-FameContents-n.name: I will deactivate the hatch lock on the guns! The power of the guns will be immense even with manual control!

52010055_QD__52010055__21-FameContents-n.name: Still you resist! Your efforts are futile!

52010055_QD__52010055__26-FameContents-n.name: How dare you touch my subordinate!

52010055_QD__52010055__28-FameContents-n.name: This isn't over... This world will be engulfed in unending darkness!

52010055_QD__52010055__29-FameContents-n.name: Graah! They beat the boss! Flee!

52010055_QD__52010055__31-FameContents-n.name: That was was a pretty messy situation, wasn't it?

52010055_QD__52010055__32-FameContents-n.name: You performed expertly. Even Deireadh was in awe of your might.

52010055_QD__52010055__33-FameContents-n.name: The enemy has retreated! Good job everyone.

52010055_QD__52010055__34-FameContents-n.name: Everyone outside the carrier, return to the command center.

52010055_QD__52010055__35-FameContents-n.name: Our first priority is restoring order to the ship.

52010055_QD__52010055__36-FameContents-n.name: Med teams! Go deck by deck and treat our injured. Engineering teams, restore all critical ship functions!

02020019_BF__02020019_battle__0-FameChal.name: Combat parameters locked in! Shall we start the simulation?

02020019_BF__02020019_battle__1-FameChal.name: This next wave should be tougher!

02020019_BF__02020019_battle__2-FameChal.name: Looks like that was too easy for you. Let's turn up the settings!

02020019_BF__02020019_battle__3-FameChal.name: You're doing better than I expected. I'll increase their combat level.

02020019_BF__02020019_battle__4-FameChal.name: Not many people make it this far.

02020019_BF__02020019_main__5-FameChalle.name: The test will end when you're knocked out. Good luck!

02020019_BF__02020019_main__7-FameChalle.name: This is invaluable data. Thanks for participating!

02020021_BF__battle__0-FameChallengeDung.name: The battle's just begun. Don't get cocky!

02020021_BF__battle__1-FameChallengeDung.name: I bet I can make you sweat.

02020021_BF__battle__2-FameChallengeDung.name: Don't be above cheap tricks. On the battlefield, defeat means death!

02020021_BF__main__7-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Amazing! You definitely have what it takes to join the Shadow Walkers!

02020021_BF__main__8-FameChallengeDungeo.name: I really was hoping you would last longer...

02020023_BF__battle__0-FameChallengeDung.name: That's enough sparring for one day.

02020023_BF__main__5-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Fight for as long as you can stay on your feet.

02020023_BF__main__6-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Keep moving if you want to survive!

02020023_BF__main__7-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Excellent. It's seems I have quite the capable crewman on my hands.

02020023_BF__main__8-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Your form isn't bad, but you need more training.

02020025_BF__main__5-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Isn't this the Royal Guard's training yard?

02020025_BF__main__6-FameChallengeDungeo.name: I know I can, old man!

02020025_BF__main__7-FameChallengeDungeo.name: You only get one shot at this. Here I come!

02020025_BF__main__8-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Huff... I was going easy on you. Didn't know I was such a nice guy, did you?

02020025_BF__main__9-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Bahaha! Did you really think you could defeat me, Condor?

02020027_BF__02020027_battle__0-FameChal.name: That will be enough for today.

02020027_BF__battle_1__0-FameChallengeDu.name: Mason is preparing a powerful attack. Defeat the Lumiknight phantoms to stop him.

02020027_BF__main__6-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Now, show me your true strength.

02020027_BF__main__7-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Hmm... Well, you show great promise.

02000410_BF__Event01__0-CrimsonBalrog01-.name: We've taken out the cannons on their port and starboard sides! They're swinging around to fire the main guns!

02000410_BF__Event01__1-CrimsonBalrog01-.name: Quickly, man the cannons at the front of the ship!

02000410_BF__Event01__2-CrimsonBalrog01-.name: We've disabled the enemy's weapons! I think they're backing off...

02000410_BF__Event01__3-CrimsonBalrog01-.name: ...Wait! I'm detecting a huge energy spike from inside their ship!

02000410_BF__Event01__4-CrimsonBalrog01-.name: ...Infernog. So you've decided to show yourself. Now the real battle begins.

02000410_BF__Event01__5-CrimsonBalrog01-.name: Analyzing sensor readings... There seems to be some kind of magical barrier around Infernog!

02000410_BF__Event01__6-CrimsonBalrog01-.name: Unless we destroy that shield, it won't matter if we hit him with the cannon!

02000410_BF__Event01__7-CrimsonBalrog01-.name: $MyPCName$, I believe in you. Break through Infernog's defenses so we can end this threat for good!

02000410_BF__Event01__8-CrimsonBalrog01-.name: Analyzing sensor readings... Infernog seems to be more powerful than we thought!

02000410_BF__Event01__9-CrimsonBalrog01-.name: Unless we first weaken Infernog, it won't matter if we hit him with the cannon!

02000410_BF__PopUpCinema__0-CrimsonBalro.name: All hands, prepare the cannon to fire while $MyPCName$ keeps Infernog distracted.

02000410_BF__PopUpCinema__1-CrimsonBalro.name: Aye, captain! Connecting cannon to main reactor!

02000410_BF__PopUpCinema__2-CrimsonBalro.name: You fools seek to challenge Infernog, the immortal demon lord? MWAHAHAHA!

02000410_BF__PopUpCinema__3-CrimsonBalro.name: Go, my minions! Crush the humans and their puny ship while I rally my strength!

02000410_BF__PopUpCinema__4-CrimsonBalro.name: Hmph! We won't go down so easy! $MyPCName$, I'll keep the ship steady. Deal with Infernog and his battleship!

02000410_BF__PopUpCinema__5-CrimsonBalro.name: The Big Gun is in position!

02000410_BF__PopUpCinema__7-CrimsonBalro.name: The Magitron reactor is at 90% capacity!

02000410_BF__PopUpCinema__8-CrimsonBalro.name: Do we have a firing solution on Infernog?

02000410_BF__PopUpCinema__9-CrimsonBalro.name: It's not that easy to lock onto a moving target!

02000410_BF__PopUpCinema__10-CrimsonBalr.name: $MyPCName$, we need more time. I'm counting on you!

02000410_BF__PopUpCinema__11-CrimsonBalr.name: Analyzing enemy movement and calculating predicted targeting correction!

02000410_BF__PopUpCinema__12-CrimsonBalr.name: We're only a few minutes from a targeting lock! The fate of the world is in your hands, just hold out a little longer!

02000410_BF__ClearCheck__0-CrimsonBalrog.name: No! You can't give up now! Get back on your feet!

02000410_BF__ClearCheck__1-CrimsonBalrog.name: There's not enough time! Abort the targeting sequence and sound the retreat, before Infernog turns his attention to us!

02000410_BF__ClearCheck__7-CrimsonBalrog.name: Gah! This is but a flesh wound... You only delay the inevitable. All will kneel before me, or burn in hellfire!

02000410_BF__ClearCheck__8-CrimsonBalrog.name: ...D-did it work? Wait... No! I'm still detecting Infernog on radar!

02000410_BF__ClearCheck__9-CrimsonBalrog.name: ...I'm afraid we've failed. Infernog's shield was too powerful. $MyPCName$, return to the ship and we'll revisit our plan.

02000410_BF__ClearCheck__10-CrimsonBalro.name: We can't go on like this! The ship can't hold out against their cannons!

02000410_BF__ClearCheck__11-CrimsonBalro.name: D-did it work? Wait... No! I'm still detecting Infernog on radar!

02000410_BF__ClearCheck__12-CrimsonBalro.name: It seems Infernog got away... $MyPCName$, return to the ship for now.

02020098_BF__PopUpCinema__0-Kritias_Infe.name: Can you survive the curse of my gaze? Mwahaha!

52010052_QD__ACT01__0-FameContents-null.name: With this power... I don't need your help. I'll stop $npcName:11003795$ on my own!

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__0-Surviv.name: Ohoho! Welcome to Mushking Royale hosted by yours truly, the magnanimous Mushking!

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__1-Surviv.name: Prove your might by defeating all other participants!

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__2-Surviv.name: It seems like not everyone is here yet. Let's wait a bit longer.

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__3-Surviv.name: Aww you're all so cute with your tiny little heads. If you were bigger than me, I'd have to eat you to gain your power. Ohoho!

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__4-Surviv.name: Isn't Mushtopia beautiful? Although I'm curious to learn more about this 'Victoria Island'...

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__5-Surviv.name: Ugh! How long must I wait? Everymush has their limits!

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__6-Surviv.name: You may have noticed that I've used my mushnificent power to return you to the sad and squishy forms of your youth. Best way to ensure a fair fight!

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__7-Surviv.name: However, I have prepared several useful items to spice things up. You will find them in chests or on mushrooms. Use them well!

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__8-Surviv.name: My Sleepy Spores will cover more and more of the battlefield as time goes on.

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__9-Surviv.name: I wouldn't breathe those spores in if I were you. At least, not if you want to win. Ohohoho!

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__10-Survi.name: The Mushroom Towers throughout the map will reveal your position to others. Be wary!

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__11-Survi.name: Alright, shall we move to the starting point?

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__12-Survi.name: Hop aboard my hot-mush balloon to find a good starting spot.

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__13-Survi.name: The winner will receive my favor, and the losers get nothing! Ohohoho!

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__15-Survi.name: What? Is this everyone? We can't hold a match with turnout this poor!

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__16-Survi.name: Regrettably, I'll have to cancel the match. Head on back, and we'll try this again later.

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__17-Survi.name: Ahem, I suppose there are enough of you here. Good! Now let's begin.

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__18-Survi.name: You will be returned to your previous location momentarily.

82000012_survival__05_RAREBOX__0-Surviva.name: I've placed a golden mushroom chest near a Mushroom Tower. Go and find it!

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__0-Surviv.name: Ohoho! Welcome to Mushking Royale hosted by yours truly, the magnanimous Mushking!

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__1-Surviv.name: Prove your might by defeating all other participants!

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__2-Surviv.name: It seems like not everyone is here yet. Let's wait a bit longer.

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__3-Surviv.name: Aww you're all so cute with your tiny little heads. If you were bigger than me, I'd have to eat you to gain your power. Ohoho!

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__4-Surviv.name: Isn't Mushtopia beautiful? Although I'm curious to learn more about this 'Victoria Island'...

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__5-Surviv.name: Ugh! How long must I wait? Everymush has their limits!

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__6-Surviv.name: You may have noticed that I've used my mushnificent power to return you to the sad and squishy forms of your youth. Best way to ensure a fair fight!

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__7-Surviv.name: However, I have prepared several useful items to spice things up. You will find them in chests or on mushrooms. Use them well!

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__12-Survi.name: Want to head somewhere far away? Hop aboard my hot-mush balloon. Choosing a starting location is an important part of battle strategy.
